11111.content:
Agumon went for his usual walks in the capital city of the Digital World. Ever since every known evil has been defeated, the Digidestined and their Digimon had more time to do what they wanted.

The city always changed, every few weeks there was a new shop, or recreation centre and so on. Agumon was walking down a particular street when he came across a new shop selling health-care products. A huge sign written in Japanese wason the roof and the door had a welcome mat just below it.

Curious, he walked into the shop. It was neat and tidy inside with clean white walls and glass shelves. Every item was in order. The shopkeeper, a slim-looking Veedramon, came up to Agumon and welcomed him.

"Good morning and welcome to my little health-shop. Since your my first customer, you can have a free item."

"Thank you for the offer, but I don't have anything in mind," said Agumon.
11111.title: Grand Opening

choices: Agumon goes home to test it out
111111.content:
"Well, you look like a stocky young fellow. Perhaps I could give you this. Just arrived this morning." He opened a cardboard box and got out a short plastic bottle. the label had a photo of a Leomon showing off his chest and the words in bold: "LionHeart Muscle Gain". Agumon knew that it was a muscle-building supplement. The thought of being big and muscular excited Agumon and he took it off the Veedramon's hands.

"I'll take it!" he said enthusiastically.

"Ok, but I must warn you, they're highly experimental. So use them wisely." Agumon nodded and exited the store with his free item.

1111111.content:
Agumon took a portal back to Tai's house, his free prize in hand. Tai wasn't home so it gave him the opportunity to test out the supplements. He went into his room just opposite Tai's and shut the door. He excitedly tore off the plastic wrapping and popped off the cap. He shook out a simgle silver pill from the inside and a small slip pf paper.

"Take one pill a day for instant growth," it said in small black letters. Agumon then swallowed the single pill in one gulp. Seiing that the pill would take some time to take effect, he decided to take a nap. Yawning, he lay down on his matress and soon fell asleep.

20 minutes into his nap, Agumon felt hot despite his air-conditioned bedroom. That was because of his changing physique, which took on a humanoid form, his bones cracking and reforming. His round belly flattened, and then six lumps raised up where the flab once sat and hardened into muscle. His small pecs and shoulders grew larger and tighter, bulging with hard muscle. His arms grew longer and bulkier as biceps the size of basketballs formed. His legs grew longer and stronger so as to accomodate the "thunder-thighs" and bulky calf muscles.

As the change grinded to a halt, a small stubble appeared on Agumon's chin as it grew into a dark brown goatee. He raised his arms subconsciously to reveal growing bushes of hair on his armpits. The foul stench slowly circulated the room and soon reached Agumon's nostrils, which woke him up.

Covering his snout, his body felt...different. He looked down and discovered he had muscles!

111112.content:
Agumon looked around the store, trying to decide what his free item would be, but there wasn't a whole lot there that looked interesting. Judging from the Veedramon that ran the place, who was incredibly thin, this place would help somebody lose wait, but that wasn't exactly his problem. Most everything in the store was health food, and like all others of the type, all looked bland and taste less. Then, he came across a row of things that looked interesting to him. There were two right next to each other. One was labeled, "body swap powder" which sounded interesting, but Agumon had no idea how that would work, but the store owner came over, and saw his inquisative look. "Yeah, that's some special stuff right there. There a pill you take in the can that marks you as the owner of the powder, then you get someone else to eat the powder. It's relatively tasteless, so it's not hard to get someone to do it. After it gets in their system, their build will switch with yours. If your fat, and their skinny, then within a few days, you'll be skinny, and your body fat goes to them. It also works with muscles. Though, some of the people who tested it found that if they got someone to eat the whole can, they completely switched bodies, so be careful with it." That sounded like it might be entertaining to Agumon. Heck, Davis had been getting pretty muscular lately to impress Kari, he could swap muscles with him. Heck, there were plenty of digimon with more muscle weight than him. "Heck, I wonder what flamedramon would think if he suddenly lost his definition, or gained greymon's fat!"

It was an appealing idea, but the other product was also looking good. It was a ray beam of all things. "Oh yes" chimed in the Veemon, his voice filling with pride at the opportunity to describe his product, "this is a temporal thought changer." Agumon continues looking quizzical. "Well, to put it simply, you point it at someone, and you change their attitude about their bodies, but you can do it through time, so, say, a friend of yours is skinny. You set this ray to ten years ago, and set it to fat, history will change so that throughout that entire time, they wanted to be fat, and bam! They're obese in the present, since the past has changed so that they always wanted to be heavy." Now Agumon was just stunned. He could change the past?! How is it this guy hadn't thought of using this ray for other things. "Of course, you can always experiment and find new ways to do things to people." Agumon liked that idea, and he could use it on himself to be more muscular. That would be nice, but he could have fun with all the other digdestined too.

"hhmm, but which one do I want more?"

111121.content:
Deeming it wise to leave this suspicious forest and search for consumption later, Agumon trekked the path leading out of the forest. The dirt trail led him through twists and turns in which the expectation for the end of forest beyond each hopeful bend led him to disappointment. Persistent, Agumon trudged on, the thick trees and undergrowth still framing the path he had been traveling on since he entered these woods. His growling stomach lowered his determined optimism and, to distract himself, he began examine the wild life.

It just occurred to Agumon that most of the plants of this forest were over sized and enlarged; the trees, as large as a big minivan for the smallest, appeared to be stuffed moderately over their limit and vegetation looked at though they were filled with water. Agumon stared, bemused. He rarely seen plants as huge at these, seemingly overindulging in their nutrients to the near breaking point. Oddly, Agumon got the impression that if the plants consumed all their nutrients without fail for the rest of time, they would grow like balloons forever and never reach their exploding point, if they had one.


The dinosaur Digimon then sensed a foreboding sensation that radiated from his surroundings and shuddered. This wasn't the usual dread that signaled the oncoming threat of a homicidal being, which confused and unnerved him. This feeling was like a group of mischievous individuals concocting a plot to play a childish and good natured prank on an unsuspecting victim who wouldn't hold their actions against them. For a moment, Agumon was curious if that smell was part of this and was on the verge to wait around to see what scheme he would fall for, when he shook himself to his senses.

“I got to get out of here,” muttered Agumon as he continued on the endless trail, “Why did I decide to take a walk here, anyway?”


Agumon's rumbling stomach grew louder, the increasing absence of something to eat sending his digestive organ in a great titter. His attempts to ignore it were soon becoming pointless and as the trudged on and on with no end in sight, Agumon wondered if his hunger was going to drive him crazy. He was briefly considering how much the trees and plants would fill him when a break in the forest on the path's side caught his sight. To slight disappointment, further investigation revealed the the grassy shores of a wide light blue river. The opposite bank was the spitting image of its counterpart and the river led to areas that Agumon felt no inclination to explore, but the water looked good enough to stave off his hunger for a couple of hours.

Agumon rushed to the bank and dunked his maw into the water, reemerging a few seconds later to give a small howl of delight. The liquid was cool, clean and felt wonderful and the dinosaur was only too eager resume his long drink.

It must have been thirty seconds before Agumon satisfied his thirst and he paused to sigh blissfully. That felt very good! That should keep his stomach busy long enough so he could find a way out of this forest. With nothing else but this goal in mind, he stood up.

But that was then he sighted something usual and to further exploration revealed...
111121.title: A Refreshing Drink

choices: The seal began pumping Agumon with water.
Agumon was pulled into the depths of the river
1111211.content:
But that was when he sighted something unusual and further exploration revealed it to be a creature in the water. Agumon stepped closer and squinted. They looked like pink seals, green-eyed, and with elephant trunks attached to their noses. After the 50th or so bread he felt bloated. In fact he was. His stomach bulged out further than it had ever and it seemed some of the contents were draining into fat spreading all over his body, plumping him out. It wasn't much, but if he didn't stop soon he'd probably burst. But despite knowing the situation, there wasn't any actual pain. He didn't have a stomach ache from eating too much. He didn't feel full, though he wasn't hungry either. It was like the bread was chocolate. You can eat a lot and not feel full, but what was the purpose of this. His answer finally came.
Pixiemon came by and saw Agumon 's predicament. "Ate the forbidden bread didn't you?"
"Yes, but I didn't know it was. You'd think they'd put up warning signs or something like that."
"They do, but digimon usually are too hungry to notice before it's too late. Eat two loaves and your hooked."
"Man, and I was suspicious after the first loaf. I shouldn't have taken the risk."
"Don't beat yourself up. This isn't a punishment, it's a trial. It's called forbiddedn bread cause only the worthy may eat it."
"Uh, so what it the trial?"
"You're already doing it, you just eat the forbidden food, and not just bread, but other foods, but forbidden."
"Right.... forbidden. Uh, it this going to last long? I mean this is like my 60th loaf and I'm already getting kind of fat."
"Well it's a good thing you're a big eater normally. You fail the test if you lose mobility. Since you're used to binges like these you should do better than some of the others."
"But I don't binge... at least not like this. And what do you mean others? How many others took this trial?"
"Thousands. Hey, it's really good bread."
"Ok, so how many passed?"
"None, and they suffered the consequence."
"What consequence?"
"Well, naturally, if you become immobile you fail and if you just wait for you to lose weight you'll just go back to eating. To solve this problem the digimon who fail are formatted and turned to digi eggs to start over. It's the only way to get the affects of the bread out of them."
"That can't happen to me. Tai and the others were be upset... and laugh at me for being defeated by food. I love food."
"Well I hope you do cause you'll need to to get past this. Now eat your heart out."
1111222.title: Trick or Treat?

choices: There was a hiss and the tanks emptied their contents.
11112222.content:
Grimacing, Agumon began eating the bread again. After eating it a few times, he plumped out more, but after another bite, nothing happened.

"Um...nothing's happening. Did I pass?" said Agumon

A rumbling sound from his bloated stomach was heard

"Oh, I'm not so sure." said Pixiemon.

Then Agumon began swelling, but not with fat. Over a dozen tanks were growing inside his belly, making himself incredibely tight.

Then...
11112222.title: The Next Step

11121.content:
Gabumon was sitting at home, feeling rather bored. Matt was at a band practice and everyone else seemed to be rather busy at the moment. To make matters worse, nothing seemed to be on TV at all which left Gabumon with nothing to do. "Might as well go take a nap," Gabumon sighed, reaching for the remote to turn off the TV when an ad came on.

"Are you feeling fat? Do you have that spare tire you can't get rid of? Is your stomach your personal air bag?" the announcer asked, holding a small box in his hands, "Well say good bye to those jelly rolls and say hello to a new, improved you! Introducing the new Muscle Band! Wear it and just watch the results in your life!" The ad then went on, displaying some health risks and then a few before and after pictures of some previous customers. "Order in the next 3 minutes and get this fabulous item for FREE!" The announcer went on, a little clock appearing on the bottom right of the screen to count down the three minutes.

Gabumon looked down at his stomach, poking the soft spot that it was. Over the years he'd probably put on a few pounds and here was what looked like a good opportunity to lose his little gut. Besides, if he was stronger than he could probably impress the others a bit. A quick phone call later and Gabumon was now energetic with anticipation since the band would be coming by some super express mail.

About 2 hours later, a small thud came from the front door and Gabumon rushed eagerly to get his package. After ripping the box open and removing the extra packaging, Gabumon held the Muscle Band in his paws briefly before putting it on. A sudden tingling began to occur in Gabumon's body, starting at the Muscle Band and spreading throughout his body. With the tingling came a wave of drowsiness so Gabumon went down for a nap.

While he was sleeping...
11121.title: Muscle Growth

11122.content:
Gabumon blinked his eyes open and stared around. He was laying on the gray wall of a small store, with aisles of swelled fruits and vegetables in their possession. The air, strangely grim and cheerful all at once, made Gabumon uncomfortable and he averted his eyes to the conveniently placed checkout counter. A cheerful Monodramon decked with a white hat and apron stood behind it and he waved encouragingly at Gabumon with a glint of mischief in his eyes. Apprehensive of that look as he was, Gabumon felt no choice but to join him.

“Hello stranger.” the Monodramon said pleasantly, chuckling over his own greeting. “What brings you here.”

Gabumon blinked confusedly. “Um...I don't know. The last think I remember was going to sleep in the area I guard. How did I get here?”

Monodramon's smile turned mischievous. Gabumon stared at him warily.

“Did you bring me here?”

“Yup!” said Monodramon cheerfully. ”Business was sort of getting boring for a couple of days and I decided bring a customer in myself would lighten up the monotony.”

“You should have asked permission first before doing that,” Gabumon said sternly, “Taking someone when they are asleep doesn't leave a great impression on your customers.”

“They generally don't come even when I ask.” replied Monodramon vaguely. He waved at his selections. “Want some fruit?”

Gabumon was about to say that he wouldn't buy anything from the person that kidnapped him, but upon inspecting the selections, he paused. Many of the selections were things of his taste and this fellow didn't seem too suspicious. Probably wanted to pull something harmless on him that would have both of them laughing in the end. With a shrug, he made a choice and was handed a watermelon-like melon.

“Uh, oops. I don't haven't got any money.” Gabumon discovered sheepishly.

“Aw, that's no problem. In fact, that wasn't what I intended.” Monodramon pointed his thumb backwards. “I just want you to follow me to the back.”

Gabumon suddenly felt a wave of uncertainty. Following this odd Digimon to the back of a store where he had obvious control sent alarm bells ringing in his head. However, he couldn't pay for this product and he felt obligated to do something to make up for that.
11122.title: The Mysterious Store

111221.content:
"Um...can't I just wait and complete this transaction here?" Gabumon asked.

"Oh?" Monodramon raised an eyebrow and then shrugged. "Sure, fine. Just give me the fruit and wait here."

When Gabumon complied, Monodramon left, the playful warning of "Don't go off and steal anything!" ringing in his ears.

He was gone for quite a while. Gabumon shifted nervously on the spot, glancing around at his surroundings. What was taking the Rookie so long?

Then, he heard the sound of something large being pushed towards the door. He gazed at it warily until it stopped and silenced followed. Then, Monodramon appeared through the door, looking spunky as usual, though his body language told Gabumon that he was attempting not to look suspicious.

"Everything's okay, you can have your fruit back." And so Monodramon handed the fruit back. "Now that that's settled, let's get this over with, okay?"

"Sure, thank you very much." Gabumon bowed politely and made to leave the store.

"Wait." the calm call tinkled something inside the furry reptile and he looked back.

"Ye-HMPH!?" In midword, a hose was shoved into his maw and, raising his gaze, Gabumon saw a huge grey tank pushed out of the door and the hose forced onto him connected to it.

"Now that the business is over, let's get THIS over with, right?" Monodramon smiled darkly and proceeded over to the switch and seized it. "After all, you didn't give this store's one in fifty special..."

Gabumon eyes widened as Monodramon turned the switch. "The Super Duper..."
111221.title: Bring out the Business!

choices: The fruit is forced into Gabumon's moulth.
Shove the fruit into Monodramon's face.
111222.content:
Gabumon shrugged and followed Monodramon. After all, he felt obligated to do something since he couldn't pay for the fruit.

The dark storeroom they entered was massive with shelves and shelves of boxes with unidentifiable contents. Gabumon leaned closer to the nearest container to inspect its insides but heard a eerie click and found Monodramon standing in front of the locked door.

"What is this?" Gabumon demanded.

"What is this? I just locked the door, that's all." Monodramon approached Gabumon, but the latter stepped back and took a defensive stance. "Now, now don't do that. There's no use for it."

"You are up to mischief," Gabumon retorted, "And suspicious mischief at that. What do you want."

Suspicious mischief." Monodramon chuckled. "Since when was mischief not suspicious? Alright, lets get to the point. You are staying here and are not leaving for a couple of weeks and we are going to have fun. Well, I hope you'll have fun with what I have in mind, but I'm sure as heck will have fun."

"What do you mean?"

"Don't worry, it's not dangerous. It might hurt a little at some point, it's most certainly pain-free." Seeing Gabumon still defensive, Monodramon sighed. "Oh, c'mon stop being like that. Or don't. It's fun when I have a struggling victim and it's fun when I have a willing victim. It doesn't matter. So, straight to the point.

"I enjoy making Digimon fat. Whether they be just bodied hatchlings or appealing megas, I amuse myself with swelling them to impossible size and seeing how I can make this happen. Now, whether you like it or not (It doesn't matter to me), you are my next victim and you are going to make you fat. With that fruit your holding."

Gabumon yelped and dropped the fruit. Monodramon happily dived for it, but Gabumon, recognizing his folly, quickly reseized it and dodged to the side. Monodramon turned to find Gabumon holding the melon like a weapon.

"How are you going to make me fat with this when I hold the cards?" Gabumon asked. "I can simply shove this in your moulth and watch you go and simply leave.

Monodramon laughed. "Oh please, I went through this before. YOu think if you simply make me the victim you can escape while I swell to immobility. There's no way out. That door has been designed to take an Ultimate's attacks and only I can know how to force it open. And you can't force the information from me. I enjoy most tortures and I have great pride in being tickled to beyond infinity. Besides," he added, grinning as he patted his basketball-sized gut, "I enjoy being inflated. The person who once made me swallow every fattening food in this storeroom got squashed and I eventually had his way with them. The size he grew made that look like a pebble. And you...I'm considering making that barely a molecule compareed to how big you are going to get."

Gabumon stared, uncertain. Even if he stuffed Monodramon with the fruit, the punishment would be pointless if the recipitant enjoyed it and he would still be trapped until he was fattened. On the other hand, he told himself, he would be swelled to beyond immobile size and he would be abscent for weeks and his friends would be worried. What should he do?

The decision came for Gabumon in an instant.
111222.title: Suspicious Mischief? Ha!

1112221.content:
Gabumon tryed to think of a way out, but he knew it was hopeless. he didn't even resist when the fruit was shoved into his mouth.
to his surprise, it tasted great! and then he started to fatten up.
1112221.title: giving in

choices: ...performed a deceptive act to get at more fruit.
11122211.content:
It wasn't mcuh, but he felt a slight layer of fat on him. He pushed against it and it was cushiony. It felt good to the touch and even better to the rub. He thought it wouldn't be too bad to eat a few more. He held out his paw for some more and Monodramon knew he was falling into his trap. "Now you want more fruit after you were so harsh to me. Come now, can't you show a little more appreciation.
Gabumon could have attacked and took the fruit easily, but his mind wasn't focused on anger or any way to outsmart him. He wanted the fruit and he craved it all the more as he dangled it in his face. He suddenly got down on his knees and begged. "Please, sir, may I have some more."
As you wish. He tossed him a few fruits a few feet in front of him and he humiliated himself by scampering to get them. Monodramon felt great pleasure in stripping him of all his pride and making him act so desperately for the fruit. After eating the few he had gotten he plumped out a good deal more, but it wasn't enough he went down to his begging position, but Monodramon yawned. I'm bored. Entertain me. Without hesitation Gabumon...
11122211.title: More!

choices: Gabumon doesn't want the fruit, but Monodramon has other plans.
111222111.content:
Gabumon thought what would impress Monodramon and then he remembered how Matt taught him to do hand stands. He quickly ran into a sumasault and caught the floor with his claws. He then began to walk on his hands, and dig his claws into the ground to appear like he was balancing. He was hoping the upsidedown monodramon was impressed.
In reality, monodramon saw how he wasn't acutally standing on his hand, but had a plan to make this act into a comedy. "Here you go, fido, catch."
He threw the fruit a Gabumon and he caught it in his mouth. It was difficult to swallow upside down and the juices were dripping up his head, making things trickier, but he managed. He body bloated a little, but he kept hold of the ground. Monodramon began chuckling as he kept throwing fruit at Gabumon, quickly became accustomed to eating this way and slowly growing in girth. As his wight increased he was slowlying losing his balance and began moving around more clumsily. But despite the sloppy performance, Monodramon kept feeding him, at an increased pace even. It was getting to the point that he had to leap to grab the fruit. His stomach carrying his momentum forward, nearly making him fly into a wall.
Monodramon's chuckle grew to a laughter as the weight finally overcame Gabumon and he crashed into the wall. Gabumon was dazed, but a few more fruit coming at him brought him to his fat senses as he munched them down too. He was so big now his fur was stretched over his head and only covered a little of his upper back. The rest of his body was on full display, especially his super-sized gut.
It was only after a few more fruits that the inevitable finally happened. The floor gave and Gabumon fell to the sub-basement. To his surprise he was in a room filled to the brim with the fruit. He wouldn't need to beg anymore as it was all in his possession.
111222111.title: The Stash

1112221111.content: Monodramon didn't expect this to happen so soon. He hoped to have a little more fun, but he figured the floors were getting on in years and bound to be weak. Now Gabumon was in his fatty fruit storage facility. After the initial shock of him fall, Gabumon began his monstrous feast. With each fruit he ate, he gained more fat. He was getting fatter by the second and it seemed that he was taking up the space that he made after eating the fruit. Juice got everywhere as he bit down into them, staining his skin and a his fur, which had finally fallen off after it had grown too small for him to wear.
1112221111.title: No Stopping Him Now

choices: One day Gabumon finds more fruit.
Gabumon gets fired.  A fatter digimon takes his place.
11122211111.content:
There was not a single fruit left, or if there was it was buried under tons of yellow flab as Gabumon had grown to epic proportions. His body was stuck in the basement. His legs and tail hidden under fat and his hands barely sticking out at his sides. His head was at the top of the mass of fat, nearly touching the floor above. His tatoo was stretched so wide it was hardly recognizable. The only thought that passed through his mind however was where to get something else to eat. Monodramon on the other hand was thinking of money.
In just a few short days a new attraction was placed in the digital world. Monodramon was selling tickets to other digimon to see Fatmon, the digitalworld's fattest digimon. There other digimon would get a big laugh at Gabumon or give him food to eat. His friends paid many visits. Some joined in the laughter and gave him food. Others were more concerned with what he had done to himself. Gabumon was too busy to notice them as he continued eating whatever food he was given or the pile of food that Monodramon would give him. Gabumon was sad he hadn't had any fruit since the basement binge, but Monodramon said that if he ate any more there's no telling what would happen.
11122211111.title: A New Attraction

111222112.content:
After eating the few he had gotten he plumped out a good deal more, but it wasn't enough.

He went down to his begging position, but Monodramon yawned. "I'm bored. Entertain me."

Without hesitation Gabumon performed an dance that seemed to contain elements of hop scotch, among other things. It was unusual, but it suitably entertained Monodramon, who was observing the humiliating activity with smug amusement. He knew that the fruit had an addictive quality and surmised that it replaced all brain activity with an nearly endless crave to have his addiction satisfied.

What he didn't know was, that though Gabumon was hooked onto the fruit, that didn't mean he couldn't form plans to mollify his craving. Monodramon just assumed that the other Digimon was desperate for his approval, which was why he was allowed to advance closer to the purple rookie. Suddenly, Gabumon snatched the fruit, gobbled it up, and grew heavier with a slight burst of fat. He dived for Monodramon, ready to incapacitate him in order to satisfy his craving, but the other rookie, alarmed but not surprised by the attack, seized another fruit from a nearby crate and squeezed.

There was a squelching explosion and the two Digimon were sent flying apart in a burst of pin. They landed in an twenty foot area covered with a pink, ice cream-like substance, looking like they dived into an overlarge milkshake. Gabumon, his senses railed back in, sat up and shook his head, splatting the substance everywhere. He looked around and discovered Monodramon opposite of him in a similar physical state, though the way he was acting hinted that exploding fruit was a normal, even entertaining event for him.

"Mmm...I love this stuff." the purple dragon said, licking around his face. He sent a grin in Gabumon's direction and said. "I was kinda hoping you would do something like that. I always find an excuse to use the exploding milkshake watermelon. It was of those things I made that I really love being a victim of."

"What do you mean?" Gabumon asked.

Monodramon's smile widened. "You'll see. Besides, this stuff is delicious! Why don't you have a lick or too before the effects happen."

"Happen?"

"You'll see." Monodramon repeated, and went back to licking everywhere the substance was on.

Gabumon stared at him and gave a tentative lick around his face. His eyes lit up. It WAS good! Gabumon began licking with more energy and would have cleaned the whole mess up if each half wasn't being slowly absorbed by both Digimon.

"What's happening?" he wondered, amazed as he watched the pink stuff disappear beneath his skin like a sponge.

Monodramon was wiggling in anticipation as the same happened to him. "Ooh, this is gonna be good! I can't wait, I can't wait!"

"Can't wait for what?" Gabumon asked, but any possible answer was cut off by an ominous....
111222112.title: Opportunistic Actions!

choices: 2000-3000 ft! (You could add more if you want to~)
1112221121.content:
A hissing sound was heard. Gabumon looked left and right frantically, trying to locate the source of the sound. Then he realized, the hissing sound was coming from his and Monodramon's stomach! "Aw yeah, this'll be good!" Monodramon laughed as he started patting his stomach.

Gabumon was just thinking about what might happen, when he felt something. He looked down to see his stomach bloating out, but not with more rolls of fat, it was inflating like a balloon! Gabumon was starting to feel stressed, but Monodramon on the other hand, looked to be enjoying this. The Monodramon was growing a bit slower than Gabumon was, since Gabumon's skin took in more of the melon's juices. Gabumon's stomach continued to bloat out, then the other parts of his body started to as well. His legs and arms were starting to get blown up, when the hissing sound ceased and the inflation stopped. Most of his fat was gone, since his skin bloated up. His fur looked like it might drop off soon, looking almost too small for him.
Gabumon sighed with relief, glad it was over.

Monodramon, however, had different plans. While Gabumon was distracted, Monodramon grabbed more of the fruit, 5 of them to be exact, and shoved it into Gabumon's mouth. Gabumon got a bit of a shock, but with Monodramon clamping his mouth with his strong hands, Gabumon had to swallow the fruit one by one. When Monodramon let go after Gabumon was done, Gabumon coughed a little, "Hey! Don't do that!" Monodramon simply laughed at Gabumon, "Pfft, I do what I want to my victims. Besides, if half of one fruit juices and absorbed instead of eaten can bloat you up THAT much (Gabumon took up nearly half the size of the room), then I HAVE to wonder how much FIVE of them, and eaten instead, could bloat you up.

Gabumon had a face of worry and anger and just as he was about to say something, the hissing sound returned, but louder than before. Gabumon gasped as he started inflating, more and more, at a faster rate. Monodramon laughed and quickly ran (or bounced, since he's kinda inflated) to the door, opened it and then went outside of the restaurant to wait and watch.

Gabumon was worried, but he couldn't help but think, that this actually felt really nice. Air inside his body, stretching and inflating his skin. Gabumon's fur soon fell out, as he felt his back reach the ceiling of the room. And then, BAM. The roof burst open as a giant yellow balloon continued growing. Monodramon smiled, and very simply bounced up to the inflating Gabumon, stuffed even MORE of the fruits in his mouth.

Gabumon groaned as he was forced to swallow it. He started inflating even faster, the whole building nearly destroyed. However, Monodramon didn't really care too much about it, watching his victim grow like that was better. Monodramon started to rub and poke all around Gabumon's body. It had that rather tight feeling, something like a baseketball.

Monodramon then proceeded to simply sitting on Gabumon's back, or what should be the back, since it's hard to tell. And casually said, "Hm, well aren't you having fun? Because I am." But Gabumon didn't seem to answer.

He continued growing, bigger and bigger, but he didn't float though. Apparently this air didn't work the same way as helium.

By the time the hissing sound has ceased, Gabumon was huge, as huge as...
1112221121.title: Giant Gabu Balloon

11122212.content:
Gabumon winced. The fruit may be good, but the feeling of his belly swelling wasn't very nice.


Even though he knew he shouldn't, he brought his fist up in a swing, which rebounded off Monodramons gut.


Sighing, Monodramon forced the rest of the fruit down Gabumons throat, "We already went over this. Either way, I get what I want."


Gabumon felt his belly swell a few extra inches from his normal size quickly, then continue slowly. He opened his mouth, but the words where lost as Monodramon, who had grabbed two more fruit while he wasn't paying attention, Shoved the next one down whole.


Gabumons neck stretched, causing a bit of pain which quickly passed. It hit his stomach, then once again, he grew, this time everything getting a layer of soft fat. His cheeks puffed out a bit, and once again, as he opened his mouth, the next fruit was awaiting.


Now, what to do?
11122212.title: Involentary Struggle!

111222122.content:
Gabumon continued struggling as the next fruit was forcefully pushed into his maw. He gave up and chewed the fruit reluctantly so he wouldn't choke, His mouth clampt firmly shut by Monodramon's surprisingly strong paws.

"It seems like you are finally catching on," said Monodramon, as Gabumon swallowed, "But you are still struggling. This should fix that."

And as he went off to search through a large box, Gabumon expanded, his stomach and chest inflating, his limbs enlarging and spreading apart, andmore flab swelling on his face. By the time it was done, Gabumon wobbled, having trouble keeping balance with his added weight. Before he could reorganize himself, a funnel enveleoped his maw and tightened itself firmly.

"Ah, that should do it." Monodramon said approvingly, pulling it more securely and looking at the tube connected to the funnel. "Can't have you struggling with me, right?"


He approached the machine the tube was connected to and Gabumon discovers that he is going to be filled with...
111222122.title: Forceful Restraint

1112222.content: Gabu shoves the fruit into Monodramon's face, but it was in vain. Monodramon laughed at Gabumon's feeble attempt to escape. Gabumon watched in horror as the laughing Monodramon expanded, thinking what should happen to him. Gabumon quickly ran to the door. It only made Monodramon laugh harder, until he was the size of an oven. Monodramon suddenly swept Gabumon off his feet. Gabumon panicked, and...
1112222.title: A feeble attempt

11122221.content:
Gabumon lifted his head and bit down hard on Monodramon's left hand.
"YOUCH, now don't be like that or i'll flatten you like a steam roller!" With that, Monodramon jumped into the air in an attempt to crush Gabumon.
But Gabumon got out of the way just in time as Monodramon hit the ground. The room shook and several boxes fell from their shelves spilling out their contents: more fruit.
"Aha, I have you now!" yelled Monodramon as he rolled toward the boxes and began guzzling quite a bit of the fruit. Pretty soon, he was practically enormous. "I'll give you to choices," grinned Monodramon evily,"either die at my hands, or fatten yourself up."
Gabumon didn't know what to do. Monodramon was so large that his (Gabumon's) attacks would have no effect on the obese dragon. However he still didn't feel like becoming a fat beast like Monodramon. He thought and thought until he decided to......
11122221.title: Serious Weight Problem

111222212.content:
"I decide to," began Gabumon calmly before yelling "BLUE BLASTER". Gabumon's blue fire spd towards a parade balloon sized Monodramon. But, as expected, the shot bounced right of Monodramon's belly.

"He He He HA HA HA HA, pathetic, simply pathetic." laughed Monodramon wickedly. "Watch this." he said as he shot an enormous fireball to Gabumon.

Gabumon ducked, but not before the fire burned off the back of his fur. "My...... fur..... you ruined....it" growled Gabumon.

"It's just a fur skinning," said Monodramon, slightly surprised by Gabumon's sudden change of attitude "You can get another one, but that won't matter because i'm about to destroy you, say hello to the digi-reaper for me."

"I used this fur to warm Matt when he caught hypothermia on the snow island, this fur is symbol of our friendship and you have mutilated it, YOU WILL PAY!"

"Oooohhh i'm so scared," said Monodramon sarcastically "what are you gonna do? Hit me with another one of those pathetic sparklers you call attacks?" Monodramon then spit out another large fire ball which burnt off even more fur. Monodramon laughed hard at his own cruel behavior. "Now come on, fatten yourself, or die."

"All right." said Gabumon smiling. He then lunged for the fruit and ate every one. The change started immediately. Gabumon's belly began to expand greatly. He then grew about nine more chins and his tail became fat and stumpy. With difficulty, Gabumon stood on his now pudgy legs, turned to Monodramon and said "Bring it on!"
111222212.title: Symbol of Friendship

1112222121.content:
"Very well." said Monodramon "Hit me with your best shot."

And the dual began.

It started with the two fat giants rolling and ramming into one another. Gabumon found that his new found fat gave him quite a bit of defence, he even saw that his opponent was starting to struggle.

"Take this," yelled Monodramon as he fired two fire balls at Gabumon which harmlessly bounced off him.

"Try this on for size!' said Gabumon as he fired a larger blue blaster at Monodramon. It actually seemed to do damage this time.

"Not bad," said Monodramon "but I have a few tricks up my sleeve." Monodramon dived for another set of shelves where he began to eat more fruit. The dragon laughed evily as he began to swell like a balloon. His ams became thickset and plump. More chins grew from his neck, and his belly fell to the floor from all the added weight. "How about this?" said Monodramon as he fired three large fireballs all of which did lots of damage to Gabumon.

But Gabumon did not give in, he to lunged for the boxes of fruit and began to eat it all. Instantly, his belly began to grow as if it were stuffed. it fell to the floor with a thump. His became flabby and he grew about 10 more chins. His legs two now resembled large hams more than anything. Unfortunately, his new weight made it very hard to move. But he didn't care. He ran towards Monodramon and shoved him into a wall.

"Now Gabumon," said Monodramon nervously "lets not be rational huh." Even he was pretty big, Gabumon was now twice his size and this of course frightened him a little.

"How's this for rational, BLUE BLASTER!!" Now this time intead of a small stream of fire, a huge horizontal pillar came out of Gabumon. This new energy came from all the food he ate so, naturally, he began to shrink as the attack went on. He shrank back to his original size by the end of the attack.
"NNNNNNOOOOOO." yelled Monodramon as he slowly distentigrated into data "Mark my words, I will come back and I WILL MAKE YOU FFFAAAATTTT!" With that, Monodramon's data swirled in the air until it turned into a digi egg and was transported to the primary village.

"Yeah, I did it." yelled Gabumon leaping with joy. Just then a portal opened up where Monodramon had been and Matt leapt into the room.

"Gabumon, buddy, I missed you so much. We looked all over for you." Matt looked up and stared around the room. "What happened? Gabumon, did you eat everything in those boxes? How are you not fat?"

"Wish granted. Please enjoy it to the fullest..." The voice went, and soon grew silent.

Almost immediately afterwards, he saw the fish in the cave started to grow bigger! They grew and grew and GREW, until they were almost four metres long each! His stomach started to growl loudly at the sight of these new, super-sized treats, and so Gomamon opened his maw wide, and allowed more fish to swim into his mouth once again.

As the fish were so much larger now, he has to swallow the loads of fish more often. In fact, only about 20 fish would fit into his mouth at once, and when it was full, he had to swallow.

By now, he was packing on tons and tons of blubber, adding more to his already massive body. At the end of his monstrous feast, he had grown to almost a kilometre long, and perhaps half as wide. The rocky outcrop of the cave was now only about half the size of his body, and that was how big he had grown from last time, and for a small seal like him, it was a great achievement.

Gomamon let out a deep, gargantuan belch of satisfaction after his feast, so loud that it could possibly be heard from a long distance away. He was enjoying every moment of being full, packed and massive. He floated on the surface of the ocean to rest and digest his rather filling meal, so that he would have the stomach to spare for another round.


Suddenly, in the middle of his rest, he heard a sound, something like the sound of crumbling rock. Out of surprise and curiosity, he swam down to the cave to check it out. To his surprise, he found that the cave had crumbled apart, due to a HUGE school of HUGE fish, now they were almost a 100 metres long each! It was then he realised that the wishing fish made the fish he ate scale with his size, so that he would enjoy eating them at any size he grew to, and even further increasing his gain! Gomamon first wished, "I want my legs to be strong enough so they can support and move all my weight!" Soon afterwards, he felt power surging across all four his legs, and he could stand up and move again. He waddled for a short distance, (acutally longer than you think, due to his MASSIVE size,) with the numerous layers of furry blubber on his belly and paws jiggling as he moved. You could even feel the earth shaking beneath you as he walked. "Feels great to be mobile once again," says Gomamon.

"Next, I want my mouth to be able to stretch as far as I wish!" His swollen, blubber packed face hindering his jaws was no longer restraining his maw from opening, so he opened it REALLY wide, and REALLY wide, that it could fit almost anything. "Whoa, that's really wide. Will come in handy..."

"And your last wish will be...?" The wishing fish went. "Finally, for my last wish...I want my stomach to be able to digest anything I swallow!" The moment he said the last word, he felt his belly gurgle a slight bit, and the load which used to be pulling down his belly (whatever he had ate earlier,) slowly diminished, and more rolls of blubber erupted out, expanding out more of his body.

His stomach groaned in disappointment as it was now empty. Gomamon rolled and laid down on his back, petting and rubbing his gigantic, soft, furry and blubbery belly with his paws (and feeling a sort of comfort like he's never had all his life which is lying on a warm mass of blubber, and most notably, his very own), and said, "Don't worry, my stomach - there's an even greater feast, coming right up, so be prepared! I don't like to waste food, so whatever I start dining on, must be polished off cleanly, even it's..."

"...the rest of the Digi-World!"
113121121111122111.title: Wishes...granted.

1131211211111221111.content:
And so Gomamon continued began his meal of the now disturbed planet. The Digi-World, actually, if you put it more specifically.

Rolling his body on its side until his expansive belly spread on the surface of the planet, he dunked his head into the ocean's water, and slurped it up. Whatever that was left in the ocean, be it rocks, seaweed, shipwrecks and junk, even including that pile of humongously large fish building up in the distance due to his previous wish, were all sucked in a swirling motion, much like a whirlpool, only larger, entered his mouth, travelled down his gullet and finally landing in his stomach, never to be seen again. Soon, he also drank the ocean and its contents dry, leaving nothing behind but small puddles.

"And that's just the soup down." Gomamon went. His belly had now swelled out slightly more, but he was still hungry. "Next, the floating morsels!"

Gomamon gulped the islands around him of the very earth, one by one, sending them down to meet his stomach. It was such a sight, with Gomamon stretching his mouth so ridiculously wide to fit the islands in. For some of the larger land masses, he would tear them off the surface of the earth, gulping them down like the Titanic sinking slowly.

When all the visible land masses were swept clean, Gomamon's body (the his blubbery mass, mostly) was now covering nearly the entire entire surface of the planet. He could feel the mass of the "food" that he had swallowed make a pulling feeling against his stomach. Along with that, he heard his stomach groan and gurgle, as it continued to stretch and stretch longer and larger to fit his next loads. "Giving up yet? I don't think so, you seemed so confident! Good. Next up is the filling!"

He looked down at the now barren surface of the Digi-World. He then bent down, and sank his mouth into the mud, and started slurping down the section of the crust. He knew that if he kept going, he would reach the mantle of this planet, which is filled with delicously hot magma.

And he was right. After boring a massive, deep hole in the crust of the planet, he could see the red-hot magma rising quickily towards him. Seeing this, he quickly stretched his maw over the massive hole, covering it entirely. Things were going according to what he wished for.

Soon, the fiery hot magma shot up to his massive mouth, flowing down his gullet like a landslide, and, as with all things he had swallowed, into his stomach. The feeling was undescribable. He had a hot, warm and spicy feeling all over his body when the magma gushed in, and although his mouth began to hurt a little because of all that red-hot magma, he still held on, and continued to swallow the gushing magma.

After the magma chamber was emptied, he had a tingling, spicy aftertaste in his mouth. "Wow...nice...but spicy...need something cool to wash it down..." Gomamon went, gasping.

The moist mud around his was his answer. He immediately buried his head into the soft mud, and began to scoop it all up with, and into his mouth. As he did so, what was left of the crust slowly disappeared into his bulging, swollen stomach, now stuffed from what he ate.

But this wasn't over yet. "Now, that's exactly how the cookie crumbles!...Hey,is there anything I missed?" Gomamon went, as he searched the black space around him, now visible because most of the planet was gone. Finally, he spotted a red sphere, which is actually the core. He propelled himself towards the glowing red ball, opened his maw wide, and swallowed.

With the warm feeling of the core moving along as it slid into his mouth, down his gullet and into his stomach, Gomamon felt successful and victorious. He had devoured the entire Digi-World, and within less than a day!

Gomamon felt very large and happy as he hugged his blubbery yet swollen belly, and murred to himself. "Now this is the life. I've never felt this gigantic before...and I'm enjoying it. Plus, my stomach, you can now rest and digest my meal now. Have fun!" His stomach groaned in unison, now full and satisfied, and backed down to begin digestion of its load.

As he was enjoying his immense newfound size, right smack in the spot where the Digi-World was (which Gomamon conveniently replaced its very position), he saw the moon pass him by. Seeing this, his eyes widened. "I've changed my mind. I'll have one last dessert before I finish my meal...a grey, bumpy, delicious ball!" Gomamon spoke, in a confident tone.

He propelled himself towards the moon, and you can already guess what happened next.

When the entire moon had finally entered his stomach, Gomamon was now a morbidly obese, white and purple spotted balloon, drifting about in the place where the planet used to be. You could still see some jagged marks on his belly, due to whatever islands he had swallowed earlier. Step aside, Digi-World, and make way for the planet-sized Gomamon!

He left out a soft, yet satisfied murr. "Ahhh....now that was one big meal. I'm sure you enjoyed it as much as I did, my stomach! I feel full and content now, and you should be, as well!" Gomamon said, as he closed his eyes, resting and letting his stomach digest...
1131211211111221111.title: Planet Gomamon, here we go!

choices: Gomamons feast is interrupted by a voice.
11312112111112211111.content:
Inside Gomamon's stomach was where whatever he had ate earlier during his massive feast was being digested. The islands were the first to be digested, and they slowly sank into the putrid pools of acid within his stomach, never to be seen again, and then added on to his bulk. The magma he had swallowed had already solidified, and was also going through the same fate. The moon slowly met its fate as well, dissolving from a sphere of stone into nothingness.

Gomamon was so tired, that he slept for two whole days before waking up again. When he woke up, his load had already finished digesting. Loads and loads of blubber were packed all over his body, belly, back, paws and all. Due to the air left behind in his stomach after digestion, his belly appeared to swell out a little, like a rutound ball. He was now the size of the Digi-World when it was still there, effectively taking its place.

Moving both huge, blubbery paws, he rubbed and patted his belly with satisfaction. "I'm sure you enjoy it as much as I did, my stomach!" Gomamon went. "Mmm, this size is really comfortable, with blubber to cushion me wherever I go, and it keeps me warm and fuzzy..." He let out a soft murr, but then felt a strong pressure welling up his throat. He let out a monstrous burp, which rumbled throughout his belly, vibrating the flabby mass of his blubbery body. After he had finished, the swell on his belly had diminished, but was still laden with layers of blubber.

"Ahh, that felt much better." Gomamon said. But he felt his stomach start to grumble again, signalling that he eat even more food.

"Getting a little impatient, are we? Ah, but that was just an appetiser of sorts. What's on the main course next, you guess? Hmm..."
11312112111112211111.title: In The Belly Of The Beast

choices: He continues his feast on the planets
As he sleeps a gurgling rumble rolls through him. Something inside is changing.
113121121111122111111.content:
Gomamon's eyes darted towards the direction of the Sun. The great, fiery ball of fire was before him, and he started to drool at the sight of it.

"So...bright...but...must have it..." Gomamon said, as he swam with his great flippers towards it, the Sun appeared to be growing bigger as he closed in on it. When he was just a few metres away from its flaming surface, its massive size dwarfed even Gomamon's blubbery body. He felt the intense heat on his face, and his entire body. Normally, anything else would have combusted upon reaching such a celestial body, but his blubber somewhat helped him to survive even this intense heat.

"Hot...hot..." Gomamon said, squinting his eyes as he stared at the fiery body in front of him. "Ready up, Gomamon, and my stomach, the main course is coming right up!" he went confidently, closed his eyes tight, his maw stetched open as wide as he could, and attempted his meal...

A very scorching feeling was felt in his mouth as his maw sank into the fiery Sun. It felt soft, as it was a giant ball of burning gas after all. He inhaled and swallowed the hot, burning gases down, where every swallow brought a yellow glowing swell down his gullet, much like water flowing through a hose, where they ended up in his stomach, still glowing. Gomamon could feel his gaping maw hurt intensely, but he continued gulping due to the warm fuzzy feeling that flowed along his throat, growing and collecting in his belly. "Mmmm...this is so comfortable..."

As Gomamon slowly gulped down the sun, his belly swelled outwards like a swollen inflated balloon, growing bigger and bigger, while the sun started to shrink in size gradually, as more and more of its contents began to end up in Gomamon's hungry belly.

After the Sun had finally been swallowed whole by Gomamon, Gomamon's belly was so swollen, that he felt as if it was going to burst. But his stomach, being a rather competetive one, was not one to give way that easily, not to mention that his blubber was also helping Gomamon to contain it without burning a hole right through him. Right not, Gomamon's belly was glowing like a giant torchlight, and he felt all warm inside, as the swallowed ball of gas began to digest inside him. He let out a small puff of fire as he finished his meal.

"Whoosh...That was a rather spicy experience, there. I feel so warm...and I'm even glowing!" he cried out in excitement. "You did well again, my stomach." He said, as he patted and rubbed it once again, enjoying the warm feeling as the glow slowly faded, being extinguished by his stomach.

The Sun digested rather quickly, and as his belly reduced in size, his blubber began to expand out even further, to the about the size of the Sun he just ate. "Mmm...it's over already? I was expecting it to be longer...ah well, even more blubber packed on me now..." Gomamon said, as he closed his eyes and rested...
113121121111122111111.title: A rather spicy meal

choices: One of Gomamon's Digimon friends spot the beached whale.
1131211211112.content: Suddenly, Gomamon had a sensation of thirst and a great urge for water. There's water all around you, thought Gomamon. A great salty after taste hung in his throat and desperately needed to drink anything to wash it down his stomach. He opened and let the water rush in through his throat to relive his longing thirst and upon thousands over thousands of gallons of water was forced into the whale's belly. Water, fishes, rocks, and seaweed were being sucked through the whale's mouth. He didn't care if it was salt water, as long as there was something to wash down the fishy taste into his gullet.His body grew more into a shpere-like shape and less like his former self. As the seal grew and began to be trapped in the cave but the obese balloon shattered the cave as if a moster has escaped from its cage. The 'mon of a whale elongated as the ballon swallowed more and more water, streaching eight-hundred feet of girth was added to his frame. The water actually made his front and back flippers, claws, and neck out of the whale's numerous rollsof fat. He started to float towards closer towards the shore but the gluttonous whale, now a white and purple spotted island, tried to swallow more water. One final wave catapulted the shperical Gomamon onto the beach. Tiredness over came his ravenous hunger and he fell asleep. When he woke up...
1131211211112.title: "Gomamon's Drink"

choices: No (but that doesn't mean there wasn't someone watching him)
1131211212.content:
Gomamon decided to leave the cave, for the moment at least. He knew he could always go back. "Besides," he said to himself, "they'll probably be more fish there when I go back!"
When he was swimming away from the cave, he saw something in the corner of his eye. Thinking that it might be someone else watching him, he looked behind him, although he had to move his entire body around because of the fat surrounding his neck. So, was there anyone behind him?
1131211212.title: Wait a minute, is someone there?

11312112121.content:
Gomamon turned his massive form around to see a starry-eyed ChibiTortomon rushing up to him. "Wow, what kind of Digimon are you I've never seen one your size before?!" He asked excitedly.

"Oh, I'm just a Gomamon trying to get bigger."

"What! A Gomamon was able to get this huge amazing, I wish I could be this big." He exclaimed.

"Well I could help you, however, there are some conditions." Final on replied.

"What are they? I'll do anything to get this big." ChibiTortomon beamed.

"Okay, well they are 1. You have to stop exercising you will get nowhere trying to burn calories. 2. You have to gorge on as much food as you can possibly eat. and 3. You will have to leave your old life behind and join me for the rest of your life. So do you accept?"
11312112121.title: Yes

choices: Let's rule the world I can get fed later.
Let's eat, we don't want to disappoint.
One of Gomamons friends find them
113121121211.content:
"Yes, of course, I'll join you, I'm running away anyway, so you'll be my new family, is that okay with you," he said.

"Ah running away from home, why is that?" Gomamon asked.

"My mom, never lets me have my way, so I left to live life on my own rules," ChibiTortomon grumbled.

"Oh.. and what rules are those?"

"I get to do what I want, I get to stay up as late as I want, get to sleep in as long as I want, eat what I want, I don't have to go to school ever again, I don't have to be polite if I don't want to, I can litter if I want I can steal what I want, and I only listen to those that respect my rules," he declared.

"Ah caught myself a little rebel, have I? Well don't you worry. As long as your a lazy slob like me, you'll get to do anything you want to. I'll make sure of it," Final on smiled.

"Really? You will?"

"Of course, can't let my little buddy's dreams die, with my stature everyone will bow down to my commands. So what do you say you want me to make us kings of the Digiworld now, or do you want to get bigger now?" Gomamon grinned.
113121121211.title: Yes

choices: ...a ton of thick Seadramon staring avidly at him.
113122.content:
As Gomamon later discovered, he didn't need to leave the water to search for a method to gain weight. A few minutes earlier, he decided to swim in the river to clear his thoughts on the subject, stubbornly coming to the conclusion that he wouldn't eat the fish he befriended. As he swam around, the river got deeper and wider and when Gomamon was lolling around he took notice of a very big hole near the side.

Curious, he seeked to explore it. He swam into the darkness and continued swimming through the long tunnel for what felt like a large amount of time until he came across a cavern.

Gomamon surfaced and gazed around. It was huge! The cavern stretched around two miles in every direction and the only thing that filled the emptyness were the spikes sprouting from the ground and ceiling.

No wait! Someone was there. Gomamon peered closely into the blackness until he realized with a thrill the someone was...
113122.title: The Cavern

choices: Keep going, the road to gaining is just ahead.
Turn back.  What's the worse that could happen?
1131221.content:
Gomamon was relieved to see that MasterTyrannomon was friendly. If he was going to gain weight he didn't need any fighting to keep him trim. He greeted him and the large digimon replied a greeting in a much louder voice.
"Uh, anything good to eat around here?" asked Gomamon.
"If you want to eat then follow the path of gaining. Depending on the way you go will alter the way you end. But be warned that turning back is not an option for it shall only lead to interesting consequences. Will you proceed?"
Gomamon replied with a simple "Ok" as he was quite confused with the rules. Gomamon moved forward and saw a lone french fry in front of him. It wasn't much to eat, but every bluberous whale started eating small before they could eat big. He was about to reach out for it, but MasterTyrannomon stopped him. "Oh, I almost forgot. No hands are allowed to touch the food. Mouths only."
Gomamon was never a neat freak, but he didn't see the need to eat with his mouth. It was a frenchfry anyway, so he chewed it up no problem. Suddenly further ahead he saw a another frenchfry, a slightly larger one at that. He ate it too, but no soon had he swallow than another bigger one took it's place. He kept eating the trail of fries seeing this as pointless until the next food up ahead was a burger. Bigger than a fry, but still miniscule for a whale-to-be. He turned his head to complain about the slow pace on his weight gain, but found him nowhere in sight. He tried to think how many fries he had eaten and how far he had gone. It was a dark cave, but he still should have seen him. He began to thing if he should keep going or turn back, despite the consequences.
1131221.title: The Journey of 1000 Pounds

11312211.content:
It was a pitiful trek at first, but finally Gomamon was seeing results. A blob of fat on his stomach and it was even on his arms and legs too. He occassionally looked back to see his ballooning butt, however he wasn't getting much closer. The food kept getting bigger and bigger. From fry to burger, to crispy chicken, to turkey. He rested when he couldn't eat anymore and resumed shortly after. A few days went by. He eventually found a few other digimon on the path as him. They had their own food and were equally as plump as him. He even managed to pass a few who had grown tired of this. He even heard some screams as he figured some tried to quit and suffered the consequence.

One week later...

It was an entire platter of food. A turkey dinner and all the trimmings. It was perfectly there for a moment then a large creature flew throw it, eating everything in sight. He put the food inside him adding to his current girth. It was Gomamon and his patience had paid off. His small meals led to his new girth. He realized that he was pacing his body to handle bigger and bigger meals. He even found out the food was filled with empty calories that seemed to just appear out of nowhere, even the healthy food. He seemed to widen with eat bite. He lost his neck and the fat was covering all his body. He wasn't moving as fast as he once could but the food was worth it. Still he craved to get fatter. He was the size of a walrus now, but he was nowhere near a whale. He'd take a while going this way and he considered leaving and finding a faster way. What was he to do?
11312211.title: Walrus-Size

choices: Digitamamon's opened up a huge new restaurant.
Gomamon finds him in a place where food falls from the sky.
113122112.content:
Gomamon was fed up with this game. The food was good, but he wasn't anywhere near the size of a whale. He figured if he left he'd find a real fattening food, instead of this stuff. He headed back and was shocked in such a short time he was back at the start. MasterTyrannomon was there and angry at him.
"For one so eager to gain, you've given up all ready."
"Already?!? I've been in there for weeks now and haven't gotten half as heavy as I wanted."
"Very well, you may go, but be warned. You shall be punished. A curse shall befall you. You aren't satisfied with this food, then never be satisfied. Eat until you can't move and yearn to eat more. Never get full. Pork out forever more. That is your punishment."
MasterTyrannomon looked for Gomamon, but he wasn't there anymore. He wasn't even sure he listened. And Gomamon hadn't. He left and went on to search for food. He didn't even realized the curse put upon him.
113122112.title: The Curse

choices: The food is summoned by free will.
The food appears randomly and different depending where he is in the field.
1131221122.content:
The blubberous Gomamon was 20 times his size upgrading him from seal to a walrus, but he was far from his goal of a whale. He wandered around for hours in search of any food he could find, devouring what he could. He became was so desperate for food he felt he was actually losing weight before his eyes. He didn't even have any that this was merely an illusion created by the curse put on him. He hadn't realized he had left the cave about an hour ago and wasn't aware he was as fat as ever.
The only thing that wasn't an illusion was his untamable hunger. He felt like he would collapse if he didn't find food in a second. As if summoned from the heavens a large cake fell from the sky and plopped on Gomamon's head. He freed himself from it and after oberserving what it was dove into it, eating it quite messily. It was a good start, but it hardly filled him up and he wanted to have something more.
Just than a giant scoop of ice cream landed nearby and he immediately launched himself into it as well. He licked it gone and tried licking the layer that was on his fur. It was then that Gomamon realized...
1131221122.title: Food, Food, Everywhere, and All for Me to Eat

choices: Gatomon (harder to convince but strong and loving).
Guilmon (easier to convince but not too bright at following orders).
11312211221.content:
It wasn't until the seal decided he could go for a nice basket of fried fish that he proved his suspicions. The basket plopped in front of him loaded with the fried treat and lots of warm fries beside it.
         A few more experiments revealed that as long as Gomamon was in the huge field, and food he wanted would fall from above and land either on, or near his head.
         Looking around Gomamon thought carefully. "This is a dream come true, but it's not quite enough. I could spend the rest of my life here enjoying such delicious treats, but i need a way to get comfortable, possibly some servants too..."
         Already a plan was forming in his mind of living as life as rich and happy as any king. But there was more he needed to do. And unfortunately it would require leaving the wonderful field for a while. Summoning a tripple bacon cheeseburger, fries, and a ice cream Sunday as a last meal, Gomamon polished all of them off and, content for the moment, waddled to the edge of the field. Climbing a nearby hill the blubberous seal looked around. Spotting a digimon village in the distance, he decided they would do. He would go down to them, convince them he was a new digimon god by summoning food in the field, and the would worship and pamper him for the rest of his life.
         Making his way to the edge of the village he could see it was a mixed collection of digimon, but one breed stood out the most...
11312211221.title: A plan forms...

114.content: Second part of Digimon choice
114.title: Decisions Part 3

choices: It's time to have quite a word with Lucemon.
11412.content:
With Apocylamon destroyed peace had come to the Digital World, and the Chosen Children were finally able to get true rest. TK had not visited Patamon in some time, and the small digimon had regretedly become rather lazy during the peace. He had gained quite a bit of weight, and honestly wondered what TK would think if he saw his partner in such condition. Patamon knew that TK would likely be visiting him soon, and he had immediatly decided that the only real option was lose his extra pudge by the time his friend returned.

Patamon visited a number of gyms in the coming days, however none of them offered the immediate results he sought; until the last one. To Patamon's surprise it was this gym's grand opening, and as a promotion it was offering free one month memberships. Time was still Patamon's main issue, but he decided to try it nonetheless. It was moderatly crowded, but to Patamon's surprise he was speeded ahead of the others; apparently the staff recognized him as one of the heroes whom had saved them in the past.

He was greeted by the staff members of the gym, a small angel digimon he did not recognize and the most muscular Greymon he had ever seen, whom politely welcomed him. Oddily enough the gym had none of the exercise machines of the others, instead it more resembled a supermarket filled with cans of some sort of drink. To Patamon's surprise this gym guaranteed immediate results with no effort! According to the angel the gym's "program" was simply to drink three cans of it's special formula a day, and watch the results! Apparently it altered the body's metabolism, so that rather than gaining weight, eating more would instead produce mass muscle!

The whole thing seemed a bit too good to be true, yet the greymon insisted that it was how he attained his results, and finally Patamon decided he would give it a try. His month long membership gave an unlimited supply of the drink so Patamon took home a few cases. It was still early so he took his first drink right before having a rather large meal, and to his surprise he quickly found that his form had slimmed out in only these first few minutes. He repeated the process over the next two meals, and by the time he settled into bed he was looking almost as fit as the greymon.

When Patamon awoke he immediatly planned to down a drink; however he had trouble rising! A gasp of shock burst from Patamon's mouth as he glanced down, finding himself now at least three times as heavy as when he had started; his muscles had completely melted away! It took some effort but he finally managed to roll from his bed; far too bloated to fly.
11412.title: Undesired Results

choices: Go home and keep at it
114122.content:
It had seemed everything would be perfect, Patamon was in the best shape of his life, and than as suddenly as his new found strength had come he was a blimp. Flying was too much of a strain on his tiny wings in this condition and he was forced to walk the entire distance back to the gym. By the time he made it to the building's doors he was exhausted, but at the very least he supposed he might have worked of a bit of the weight. He was equally surprised as he walked in to find a few other digimon in a shape akin to his own.

This time Patamon had to wait in line but finally he made it to Graymon's desk, Lucemon was nowhere to be seen. Graymon shook his head as he stared down on Patamon, shaking his head. "Tough luck kid, it looks like your part of a rare ten percent of the population. If you keep to the regime eventually you'll get the results you want, but until then it'll be a lot worse than this.

Patamon was halfway between crying and just plain blowing up at Graymon but he managed to avoid both. "But I need to be back to normal for when TK gets here, isin't there something you can do?!" The Graymon scratched his chin for a moment before smiling. "There are two real options. First, you can keep to diet for a while and see if things improve, if not come back, or you can go to the back room..." At this point he gestured towards a blue door in the back of the gym. "and we can remove the excess fat and get you back to normal." Patamon thought for a moment, maybe he would improve if he kept to it, or he could just try to get back to normal and hope TK didn't notice him being so out of shape.
114122.title: Side-effects

1141222.content:
If Patamon followed Graymon's suggestion things might get better, or they could get a whole lot worse. He decided that for the time being he should return to the way he was, and than try the drinks again after TK's visit. Patamon looked up at the huge Graymon and noded. "I guess I'll see what they can do in the back then..." The Graymon smiled, motioning back to the door. "Alright then, just talk to the biyomon at the desk and she'll answer any questions you have."

Patamon was uncertain as he entered the door, finding himself in a simple waiting room. He noticed that all the doors were far larger than normal; it seemed they were prepared for digimon his size. There were eight other digimon in the room, all bloated but none to his level, and to his dismay he found he would have to wait for all their appointments to finish first.

In the meantime he decided to ask the Biyomon various questions, especially involving what sort of treatment this was. With a little giggle she told him it was kind of like lyposuction, but the rest was a trade secret. Each appointment seemed to be taking quite some time, and Patamon grew more impatient. There were only two magazines in the room, neither interesting, and as his condition was the worst he wondered if he could get away with asking for immediate help.
1141222.title: Waiting...

11412222.content:
It seemed as if hours had passed, though it was likely just Patamon's nerves. Nevertheless things were going very slowly and Patamon grew more impatient by the instant. He asked Biyomon if there was any way to speed things up, but she said there was nothing she could do. With a sigh he returned to his seat.

There were still four digimon ahead of him and Patamon could not take it any longer, this whole mess was Lucemon's fault and he needed to meet with him immediatly. Biyomon began to shout at him as Patamon lunged at the door, but he did not make out her words. The door was electronically locked, however with his new found girth it easily buckled.

Patamon ran as fast as his legs could carry him down the long halls, fortunatly it seemed no one else was following. There were a number of what seemed to be medical offices however obviously the gym was under staffed; none of them were in use. After making his way through the long winding hall he finally emerged into the room Lucemon was using; and immediatly gasped.

Sitting atop the desk of this office was the small angel, his head lifted and what seemed to be the legs of the agumon whom had entered before Patamon kicking from his mouth. Lucemon's eyes widened a bit as he realized he had an unwanted guest, and he finished his meal with a quick gulp. Pushing from the desk he extended his eight wings to hover. "You weren't..." His words were than interrupted by a light burp. "supposed to come back here yet; though I must admit you look the tastiest of our customers." Patamon stepped back, staring up at the angel furiously. "It was all a lie wasn't it?! You were just making us gain weight so you could eat us!" Lucemon chuckled as he floated closer, wiggling a finger. "Despite looking forward to you so much, I might just be persuaded to make a deal with you..." Patamon shook his head, holding his ground.

"No way, TK would never forgive me if I made a deal with a creep like you..." At this point a ball of some sort of energy slammed down next to Patamon, interrupting him. Lucemon used the opening to continue speaking. "We can do this one of two ways. Either I eat you right now, or you test my new weight gaining program; afterall that would let me train countless meals of your quality. So, which is it gonna be?"
11412222.title: Lucemon's Plot

choices: He manages to keep his grip
114122222.content:
"No way!" Patamon said nothing more as he launched himself at Lucemon, smashing into his chest. It was at this point that Patamon noticed Lucemon had eaten at least four large digimon and gained no apparent weight, but he didn't dwell on this. He was more distracted by another "Grand Cross" from his foe. The ball of cosmic energies smashed into Patamon, blasting him against the office's wall. Lucemon was far more powerful than this, however he did not want to hurt his meal too badily, or to make too much noise. The room was soundproof, but nevertheless it never hurt to be cautious.

As he hit ground Patamon pushed up and launched at Lucemon, using his great weight to flatten the angel. However Lucemon showed strength far beyond his size as he squirmed upward, locking his jaws firmly around Patamon's head. Patamon squirmed frantically as Lucemon lifted back up, taking a few licks of Patamon's chin to sample the flavor. Everything seemed over, when Patamon came up with an idea. He focused all of his energy on pulling back as he released his trademark attack. "Boom Bubble!" The force of the bubble blew Patamon free, however Lucemon was not phased.

"Thanks a lot, not only did the exercise help work off my last meal, but now I'm very glad you decided that you would rather be eaten than help me." Patamon was breathing hard as Lucemon spoke, but he nevertheless managed a reply. "Don't... count me out just yet. So far we're pretty even!" This response caused Lucemon to break into greater laughter, unable to continue for a moment. "You obviously can't tell when someone is toying with you, combat is a wonderful tenderizer." Patamon prepared to muster another Boom Bubble when Lucemon simply opened his mouth and breathed in, a powerful wind generating from his lips and pulling Patamon towards him. It seemed impossible for a digimon to generate such a force, yet sure enough Patamon could not escape the vortex of Lucemon's maw. His only option was to bite into one of the desks, hoping his own mouth could keep him from being pulled in.
114122222.title: The Duel

1141222221.content: Patamon grab the desk with his mouth, putting an incredible force. It stay in that way for so long, that Lucemon lost his breath.
