1141222221.title: The Saviour

1141222222.content:
In his form from his days fighting alongside TK Patamon could probably have held. However with his now great weight adding gravity to the equation he simply could not hold. Finally his lips slipped away from the desk, and he was pulled towards Lucemon at high speed. In a panic he spun around and fired off a boom bubble, unfortunatly it was simply sucked down Lucemon's throat. Patamon spun about in a frantic attack but they were of no use, and finally his head once more entered Lucemon's mouth.

Patamon fired yet another bubble but this time Lucemon's grip was stronger, and he kept Patamon held firm. To his horror he could now hear the sounds of countless digimon, just beyond the black opening before him. Lucemon let Patamon stay in place a bit longer, savoring the flavor, before taking his first gulp. Patamon's head now entered Lucemon's throat, the sound growing louder, and the powerful muscles held him firm; he was unable to move his upperbody. However Patamon's huge belly was far larger than Lucemon's head and he hoped that it may be enough to save him from the angel's appetite, but his hopes sunk as Lucemon's next gulp sent his bulk halfway in.

Patamon was now in a situation very similer to the one of the Agumon he first saw, with his lowerbody extending from Lucemon's mouth. At this point Patamon could see partway into Lucemon's stomach, and to his shock there were at least twelve digimon within the boy's belly, and yet he seemed completely normal from the outside. Some of the digimon were staring at him but the vast majority were focused on other matters, probably searching for some method of escape. Despite his dispair Patamon couldn't help but laugh as Lucemon's tongue tickled his belly, moments before he slipped even further. Patamon did not want to hurt the other digimon but had no choice; he fired off rapid Boom Bubbles. The muscles of the throat were too strong however, and in a moment the final slip was made.

Lucemon closed his mouth with satisfaction as his meal vanished into his belly, it truly was the best of the day. After giving his belly a few soft rubs he sat back to enjoy himself for a short while. Patamon meanwhile was trapped with the other pudgy digimon, desperate for a means of escape. A lot of air had entered with Lucemon's inhalation, however it was quickly being depleted by the countless digimon. In the end he collapsed, falling into unconciousness. Lucemon chuckled as he felt the last of the struggles fade away, and gave a last contented sigh. With his meals finished he hit the button nearby on the wall, signaling Biyomon to send in the next "patient".
1141222222.title: Not strong enough

11421.content:
Gatomon woke up one morning, and looked around the Kamiya apartment. Yawning as she got up to walk across the room, she reflected on how dull everything had been over the past few days. Going from fighting the sources of the world's evil, to living the normal boring life of a house cat was quite the shift, and frankly she was bored. Sure, they went to the digital world all the time, but the days spent lazing around the house weren't her favorite. There were days like this when she though about getting a bit of romance in her life, like that would be able to give her a bit more excitement. "It seemed to work out for Kari." Kari and TK had become an item recently, and they both seemed happier for it. Naturally, everyone assumed Gatomon would start seeing Patamon, but the two hadn't really talked about it. Patamon wasn't the type to advance on a girl, being shy about the whole issue. "Not that much different than TK in that respect," she muttered to herself. Indeed, it was Kari that had asked TK out, and not the other way around. "Well, If I wanted someone outgoing, I would have hooked up with Veemon a long time ago."

Gatomon was in a bit of a dillema. She really did want to ask Patamon out, but, it was more important that he wanted to do it, and if she went after him, then he might just go on the date out of the pressure to say yes. Perhaps she just needed to be more impressive. "If I looked a bit better, it might just get him to ask me," but what would accomplish that. Contemplating hard, the digimon walked over to the mirror, and looked herselve over. "Well, I'm not very muscular. Maybe adding a few pounds would make me more attractive to him." It didn't sound like a great idea in her head, but why not? It's not like she was doing anything else today. "Now, how can I get bulked up quickly?" With a plan forming in her mind, she casually walked over to the answer to all of life's problems, the computer.

Gatomon smiled, "Well I can always look for things in the digiworld." She smiled, looking over at the computer. "I can think of a few things that might help catch someone's attention." The cat was starting to get eager for a relationship. Of course she could only get to the digital world with Kari's help.

"Really?" The girl said, later that day, holding back a laugh. "If you want to impress the guys, you should just digivolve to angewoman." Kari giggled, setting her book bags down on her bed. "I don't know if you've checked, but she has quite the online following." She giggled, "On second thought don't, you might make for some mean competition where TK is concerned."

Gatomon sighed, jumping up on the bed. "That takes a lot of energy. I just want to be... a bit more noticeable..." Gatomon said with a huff. "A more tough girl look.... It'd be better than looking like a house cat."

"Hey, you're lucky Miko's not here to give you a piece of her mind. You look cute! Just ask Patamon out if you want to." The young girl chuckled to herself, now sitting down next to her partner.

'I just want to change up my image some... can you go with me to the digital world to..."

11422.title: The future of Gatomon

114221.content:
When Gatomon returned to the Kamiya apartment, she was surprised to find Kari waiting up for her, with a giant ice cream sundae cradled in her arms.

"Uh, hi Kari, whats with the Sundae?"

"Why its for you silly!" Kari smiled sweetly as she put down the sundae and picked up Gatomon, cuddling her against her chest. "Its all for you."

"Wow, okay, whats the occasion?" Gatomon worked her way out of kari's hug and made her way over to the giant sundae.

"Well, Ive been thinking, now that the world is safe from evil there's no reason to fight anymore, and I know how miserable your life was when you were myotismons slave, so I decided to make it up to you!"

Gatomon raised her eyebrow, "With Ice cream?"

Kari giggled, "No silly, the ice cream is just the start, from now on Im going to wait on you hand and foot, youll get nothing but the best treatment from here on out."

Gatomon sweatdropped nervously, "Thats not really nessecary Kari, Im not used to being waited on."

"Now now now, I insist, its the least I can do after all the times you risked your life for me. now eat your ice cream before it melts dear, Ill go draw you a nice hot bath."

Before Gatomon could argue further Kari rushed to the bathroom. Gatomon just sighed, she knew there was no arguing with Kari once she put her mind to something, so she decided to humor kari for a little while.

'Who knows,' Gatomon throught to herself as she began eating the giant sundae, 'It might be fun'...

As Gatomon ate, an invisible force above her chuckled softly to itself.
114221.title: Pampered puss

1142211.content:
The next day Gatomon stretch and was ready to start her day. Kari had gotten her a new bed to sleep on and it was the best sleep she felt she ever had. When she opened her eyes she was shocked to see the sun was so bright. She knew it was way past seven when she usually awoke and looked for her alarm clock. It was gone so she ran to the kitchen for the time. It was past noon. Kari was in school and figured she must have taken it before she left as part of her pampering. She walked back into her room to make her bed and found that she had been left a bowl of cream. Kairi must have left that for her too. She gave it a lick and found it wasn't her normal low fat cream. She looked at the bottle and found it was a very fatty brand. It wasn't she didn't like it, but that she didn't want to drink this kind too often or she might put on pounds. She walked back into the kitchen to find her usual brand and found only a few more bottles of the fattening cream. Feeling defeat she went back to her room and lapped it all up.
She was about to leave for her daily patrol. She didn't intend to find anything, she just liked to get the exercise, but found a problem. She tried opening the terrance door, but found it locked. She tried unlocking it, but it wouldn't budge. She tried the doors and all the windows, but she felt trapped and alone in the house. She began panicking, feeling confined she jumped when the television turned on. She hadn't noticed she stepped on the remote. She never watched much television before. She enjoyed watching the catfood shows and the fishing channel every now and then, but found it more of a distraction than anything, but in this situation where she had nothing better to do she sat down and watched it. A moment later she noticed another bowl of cream. She hadn't noticed it before and wondered if all of this was Kari's doing or was she merely having a nightmare. She pinched herself and found out it was no dream. She decided she'd relax today and demand answered from Kari. She could always try and exercise in the house. She grabbed the bowl and started chugging the milk. On hte last gulp she realized what she had just done and swallowed hard. She felt more like a pig than a cat the way she had acted and felt disgusted at herself. She felt fat, but it wasn't until she put her arms on her stomach that she realized this wasnt a dream and that she had a few inches on her paunch. She was ready to do several jogs around the house when she felt tired. She felt tired and collapsed right into her bed. Now she knew something was wrong. How did she get back in her bed? She tried to get up and investigate, but her strength was leaving her. She felt like a normal housecat that lays around most of the day. She tried to fight to stay awake, but fell into darkness. The last think she heard was a strange, but familiar laugh.
When she awoke...

Gatomon awoke in her room to find Kairi sitting on the bed waiting for her to get up. When she noticed that Gatomon was awake she immediatly came to her side.
"Hi there Gatomon, how you doing? You hungry? Here have some catnip."
"Wha?" Gatomon replied weakily. Kairi was talking so fast she couldn't understand her. Gatomon tried to get up and found this quite difficult as she had definatly gained a few pounds more than she realized. Suddenly Kairi pushed her back into her bed and began shoving catnip in her mouth.
Gatomon swallowed and hollered "All right! What's going on? I don't know exactly what's going on, but you are definately not Kairi. This place, everything here isn't real. What is really happening?"
Kairi's kind smile changed to a smirk. "Well I guess you are a sharp one aren't you. You're right you aren't in your world at the moment. Your in an illusion my master created. He has a thing for turning everything into lazy slobs and he especially likes a challenge. You've proven to be a great challenge and discovered this place is all smoke and mirrors faster than all the others."

"A little coaxing at first." claimed the false Kairi who started tranforming into the other digidestined one at a time. "But after some time they''ve grown to like this lifestyle... and so shall you."
"And when I give in you'll kill me like them?"
"Don't be so judging. They are hardly dead. They are merely asleep. Being so lazy they sleep and eat each day in hourly gaps. In a matter of time they'll begin to awaken to eat some more."
And just at that moment Agumon, and Gabumon awoke and shifted position to a trowl full of food. Gatomon was disgusted by both the fact that her friends had not only slept next to their feeding trowls, but were starting to consume whatever their captor served them by shoving their faces into it.

Kari turned into the kitchen. "Oh hey Gatomon!" she said as she observed the obese digimon sitting in front of the fridge, then she managed to put two and two together. "Oh no! I forgot to feed you before I left! Guess that wasn't too big of a problem for you though." As she moved closer, Kari saw that the fridge was almost completely empty.

"Yeah, don't do that again!" Gatomon said in a very angry tone. "I had to walk all the way over to the fridge! Plus, all that eating made my arms really tired!" Already, Gatomon was loving this. She could get food anytime now! and really, that was all that mattered to her. She quickly started to rub her own fat stomach, relieving the feeling of fullness from her binge so she could start feasting again, and pressed the buzzer.

Something about how the shake was designed to build muscle but only for individuals exercising, and how taking it without exercising could lead to added pounds.

Fantasies ran through Gatomons head of what it would be like to get even bigger and fatter. Over the course of this pampering she'd begun to enjoy being big and wondered about getting bigger. Memorizing the number, Gatomon piked up the phone off her belly, an added benefit Kari had given her when she left in case Gatomon had an emergency. ANd another benefit, her moms credit card.

The order took all of ten minutes, with Gatomon ordering a full gross of the one gallon bottles of powder to be shipped to Karis apartment. Once done, gatomon settled in again with the bag of cookies she'd been gobbling down, eager to taste the shake when it came.

==========

Three days later it arrived, Kari had signed for it without even asking Gatomon what it was about. The young Digidestined seemed a little upset Gatomon had decided on it without telling her, but naturally she couldn't stay mad at Gatomon and ended up giving her a soft massage.

11422121112.title: Shipment of Super Shakes

1142212112.content:
As the days continued to roll by Gatomon moved less and less. Whenever she had to move she had Kari move her. First it was just carrying Gatomon. then as she became too heavy Kari got a small wheeled cart and padded it with pillows to move Gatomon about. Though really they didn't go far, mostly it was just to the living room to watch TV and back to Kari's room to sleep.

After about a week of this Gatomon was about the size of a large footstool and pushing two hundred and fifty pounds. She sat in front of the TV, lazily flipping channels with the remote in one hand and a buzzer in the other, her drink with a straw propped between her burgeoning breasts. She was just getting into a cooking show when Agumon entered the room.

"Sheesh Gatomon you really need to do something about this," the golden colored dino muttered as he stepped up beside the bloated feline.

"About what?" she muttered sluggishly. These days anything that wasn't food or talk of food seemed unimportant to her.

"This!" Agumon repeated and jabbed her belly with a claw, not hard enough to bruse but enough to show his claws sinking deep into her side, "It's getting way out of hand."

Gatomon just sighed as Agumon withdrew his claws. The hole in he side lingered for a moment before the fat filled it in again. Curious Agumon couldn't help poking her again. And again. And again.

"Enough!" Gatmon growled as she turned to look at Agumon, her round cheeks wobbling on either side of her face. "I don't need you telling me how to live my life. And my stomach has been feeling weird all day so just cut it out."

"You need to cut it out," Agumon muttered as he waled off, "Cut out the fat that is."

"I heard that!" Gatmon replied and rubbed her stomach as best she could. She missed her gloves but they'd gotten too small to wear a couple days ago and she really didn't want to tear them.

Feeling her stomach groan and undulate some more Gatomon hit the buzzer, assuming she needed more food. It took Kari only a few minutes to enter with a plate full of nachos covered in melted cheese. "Here you go Gatomon, my precious chubby kitty," Kari grinned as she set them on Gatomons belly just in front of her now softball sized breasts. As usual Gatomon barely replied with a nod and a smile, but that seemed to be enough for Kari.

It was a bit of an effort to eat the nachos as Gatomons arms were hard to move with all the layers of fat. She ended up having to set down both the buzzer and remote to reach the cheesy treats. However something was off. Almost as soon as she bit into the nacho Gatomon felt the feeling in her stomach increase rather than decrease. It wasn't painful but it felt like some sort of pressure. Still she refused to stop eating and the more she ate the more the feeling grew inside her. It was building to something but she didn't want to believe it.

Finally she lifted the last nacho to her mouth and, almost hesitantly bit into it.

As the mushy cheese hit her stomach, Gatomon groaned as the feelings suddenly intensified tenfold. Something was happening to her. Something new... and yet... almost familiar.

It was only when a faint glow began in her stomach that it hit her. it felt like the pressure before she'd naturally digivolved to Gatomon from Salamon. But this wasn't normal digivolving. It was something different. The glow intensified as it spread across her body. And when all of her was glowing with a soft blue light she felt the pressure release.

11422121121.title: Glutmon, queen of gluttony

114221211212.content:
"Now where did that little scaly butt get off to?"
         Gatomon/Glutmon giggled to herself as she stretched and quietly padded around the large apartment. She wanted to find Agumon pronto and pay him back for that teasing earlier. If he had thought her fat before, it would be nothing compared to what she'd do to him in turn.
         First Glutmon tried the kitchen. She knew he wasn't there of course but her new figure needed food and pronto. One box of toaster pastries and another of doughnuts latter followed by a large glass of chocolate milk and she set to looking again.
         She smiled as she tiptoed down the hall. She could practically feel the high calorie food she'd consumed adding new layers of softness to her larger frame. Unable to resist she ducked into the bathroom briefly to look herself over in the mirror, giggling as her massive hips wedged in it briefly along the way.
         Most of what she saw in the mirror was unsurprising, though the fact she no longer had to jump on the sink to see herself was different. But there was one feature that caught her off guard. She had hair. Not body fur but actual hair. A long and straight, weight like her coat too. It reminded Glutmon of Mimi's hair a bit, if somewhat shorter as it hung to her shoulders.
         Grinning she hefted her large breasts, her other most noticeable asset. Each was nearly arm armful and capped with big pink areolas and nipples the size of shot-glasses. She was also sure she could hear faint noises of something sloshing inside as she moved. Giving her left nipple a gentile tweak she could feel the bead of milk squirt onto her fingers.
         "Oh my," Glutmon grinned and licked the delicious tasting cream off her clawed finger, "Well, this should add a bit more fun to the game."
         Once more sneaking out of the bathroom (and doing her best to resist suckling on her own nipple as her hips wedged more firmly in the door frame this time), she made her way down the hall to where she knew Agumon would be. Sure enough the sounds coming from Tais room indicated the small digimon was inside playing a game.
         Glutmon slowly peaked through the crack in the door and spied the small digimon facing away from her playing an old side scrolling adventure game. Spotting the score counter in the corner of the screen, Glutmon got a great idea. Keeping her voice to the faintest whisper she activated one of bher now 'attacks'.
         "Cat's Cradle."
         She could feel the invisible web of energy connecting her to Agumon and the game he was playing without the digimon noticing. Now she had control over his size. Still whispering to herself she directed the changes, "For every point scored in the game, Agumon will gain one ounce of new fat. And for every 1-up, ten pounds."
         Almost immediately after she'd said that Glutmon watched as Agumon hit a secret block and out popped a 1-up.
         The small digimon was too eager for it to notice as his character touched it his belly began to soften, gently sagging a little further as his hips gained a little more mass. The new ultimate grinned in glee as she watched. Every sixteen points a new pound of fat rolled onto Agumons frame. And given the games generosity with the score, killing even one enemy could result in two or three pounds of new fat rolling onto his frame. But Agumon was so into the old game he failed to notice as his rump continued to widen and his legs thickened like expanding rolls of dough while his belly sagged forwards to cover them little by little. "We're moving Gatomon," Kari smiled, "After Dad cashed in the ticket this morning, Mom and Dad decided we should move to a bigger home."
"But I don't want to leave," Gatomon looked worried, "What about our friends? The other Digi-Destined. And..." Gatomon stopped short, having almost expressed her desired relationship with Patamon.
"Don't worry Gatomon," Kari smiled as she finished packing up the dishes, "We're not going far, just a couple miles to the old districts of town. Mom and Dad got a nice deal on one of the large traditional houses there. So now we'll have a proper yard for you and Agumon to play in."
Gatomon 'hmmph'd a bit at being thought of like a pet that only needed more room to play, but she knew Kari was only teasing. And a large yard would make for some nice room to practice her fighting techniques.

It took almost the rest of the day to pack up, thankfully though the movie took little time and by dinner the family was eating at their table in the new house. Gatomon felt a little uneasy though. Nice as the house was, it was a bit big and empty for the moment since they'd be unpacking tomorrow.
After dinner Gatomon decided to explore some. The house was even larger than she thought. Not counting the entrance walkway, which lead to the front gate and could be shuttered in the winter or left open in the summer, the house had four bedrooms, three full-sized bathrooms, two half-bathrooms (just a toilet and sink, no shower), a kitchen, dining room, living room, exercise room (pads replaced floorboards), a half dozen closets, a basement and an attic. It was enough to make Gatomons head swim.
Still, she decided if she was going to explore, she better do so methodically. That meant starting in the attic and working down or the basement and working up.
As she tried to decide Gatomon couldn't help but chuckle, recalling some stories she'd read online and how there always seemed to be some unusual find to be discovered in an attic or basement. She doubted such a thing could happen to her, but then it would have been fun to be proven wrong.

So, where to start...
1142222.title: New home. Time to explore.

choices: She found a box with the word "Experimental" on the side
11422222.content: Gatomon went down to the basement. The house was mostly empty so the only thing down stairs would be left over from the previous owners. "Wow... big..." She said as she walked down the stair, tail twitching behind her. There was dust everywhere, and a few boxes, but not much. Luckiliy, Gatomon had amazing darkvision, and quickly found the light switch.
11422222.title: She starts in the Basement.

If you want to stay a century in here you will never age but remain the same and if you decide the leave at that time, I'd still be one second away from walking away from the door."

         Veemon wanted to protest, but the next time he opened his mouth Davis stuffed the piece of steak inside. Veemon had no choice but to chew and swallow as Davis cut another piece.
         Veemon wasn't lying though, he could feel it in his code. He felt as if something was beginning to come apart, like his code was tearing in much the same way cheap clothes would. His stomach groaned and strained, pieces of his code actually becoming visible as his skin pulled tight and began to separate slightly.
         As strange as it was though, the more he felt himself 'tear' the more room he felt he had. A delusion maybe, or maybe it really was his breaking body making more space for the steak. Either way he was down to the last few morsels.

         "No buddy, you're going to win," Davis replied, "Just one more bite. You can do it. One more."
         Veemon felt like he was staring down a firing squad as the piece of steak moved to his mouth. he wanted to protest, he wanted to resist. But his willpower was shredding along with the rest of him. Slowly he opened his mouth, lower jaw pressed against the swollen mass of his belly, took the steak into his mouth, chewed slowly three times. And swallowed.

         The resulting noise was like a thousand mattress tags being torn off at once and coupled with a bright light that emanated from the small Digimon practically blinding Davis. He squinted through the light trying to make out the figure of his partner. Something had happened to Veemon, but what?

In fact, he happened to be above it. A hole in the ground revealed a chamber with a huge collection of yellow crystals, which exuded a strong aura. The visible waves of light told Armadillomon that a flare was on its way. He curled back into a ball and rolled down the hole. To protect himself from the radiation his armor became thick and jagged, becoming rock-like, looking like miniature mountains sticking from his widening back. Stalagmites then began growing out of his elbows and shoulders, making him look monstrous alongside his physique. I see." said Hawkmon sympathetically. "Don't worry, i'll get help." he said as he soared out of the cavern. 1231212.title: Hawkmon Discovers

1232.content:
On one evening in the Digital World, Armadillomon was scaling around Infinity Mountain in a laid back manner. Armadillmon liked walking: as long as he wasn't rushing, it felt good to move around and have the mountain air rush around him. It always revitalized him so he can go on for the rest of the day.

As he turned a corner, his eyes fell on a piece if corn laid on a flat slab. Armadillmon stopped and squinted at it. What was that doing here? That had never been on the path before.

Just as Armadillomon was musing upon its origins, his stomach reminded him that he skipped breakfast this morning and his cheeks reddened. He nervously surveyed his surroundings and cautiously approached the corn. He picked it up and studied it carefully.

“I guess it wouldn't hurt to take a bite out of this.” muttered Armadillomon as he took a chomp out of the corn. His eyes lit up. “This is good!”

He attacked the corn eagerly. When Armadillomon finished it, he rubbed his belly, licking his lips. That was really good! He should keep an eye out for more corn like that. It was so tasty and filling.

Suddenly, the air ahead of him began to churn ominously, nearly throwing Armadillomon off his feet. As he regained his wit, a Dorugremon materialized in the gush, gazing down menacingly at the rookie.

“So, you ate the corn, have you?” the Ultimate hissed.

“D-did I do something wrong?”Armadillomon stuttered nervously.

“Yes, you ate the Sacred Corn of Sin,” said Dorugremon, “When anyone tries to eat it, they demonstrate the sins they exhibit. Yours is sloth and gluttony.” he smiled unpleasantly. “As punishment, you will be indulged in those sins until you can't stand them.”

“Can't I just apologize and move on with my life.” Armadillomon begged. “Live and let live, you know.”

Dorugremon exposed his teeth in a grin. “Too late.”

Wind began rushing around them, disorienting and pushing Armadillmon around until couldn't judge up from down. Unconsciousness swept the Digimon.

The next thing he knew, he found himself in a large, shadowed room with large walls, facing a long corridor with cell doors. Dorugremon towered over him, smiling sinisterly down at the rookie.

“Ah, you are awake. So where do we begin? Ah, yes. You have two punishments. One, is the Thirteen Snakes of Ascension. Two, you face the Eternal Fruits of Longing. Neither are fatal and both would teach you a lesson on abiding to your sins. When probably recover from your punishment, you may go.“ he laughed. “Or not. There are rare times when the punished begin to enjoy their consequences and come here repeatedly for more, but I'm sure you would want to go. And there are those who don't recover. Anyway, you are lucky, you can choose your punishments. So which will you choose?”

“Is there a third option?” Armadillomon asked.

Dorugremon displayed his sharp wings. “Yes. You being reformatted.”

Armadillomon winced. How was he suppose to choose a punishment he didn't know about? He'd have to guess the one that sounded less menacing. But both of them sounded menacing and Armadillomon was nervous about both. Finally, Armadillomon came to a decision...
1232.title: An Armadillo's Mistake

“Well, don't just stand there. Go and face your punishment like a mon.”

1232122.content:
"It feels weird," Armadillomon said as he tried to move under his new girth. With every step he took, his fat rippled. Just moving was an effort, and he was exhausted after taking one or two steps. If this was how he felt from one snake, he was terrified about what he'd be like after he finished with the others.
Dorugremon chuckled meanwhile, observing the now morbidly obese digimon struggling to move. He said with a grin, "Glad to see you're receiving a fitting punishment. Still, something tells you should give it a second chance."
Armadillomon was using his now pudgy claws to clutch at his gut when the snake bite's second effect began to occur. He observed himself, all jiggly, and found himself enjoying his new physique. He even wanted to expand further. He needed to get fatter. Suddenly, he snapped back to reality as another snake, double the size of the first one, bit him. He immediately began to expand with more fat, getting a perverse pleasure from his growth. He developed new rolls on his stomach and began to get a third chin. His claws became so pudgy he couldn't use them, but since his stomach had expanded out so far, he had been lifted off the ground anyways. Even his small tail had become covered in fat.
Dorugremon began to laugh as Armadillomon became lost in the bizarre pleasure. He began to rub his stomach, despite his mind telling him he shouldn't. Still, the sensation of his sensitive rolls of fat being rubbed by his softened paws was divine. He was excited to gain more just to increase that wonderful feeling. He began to say something that sounded like "More!" but it was muffled by his fat cheeks. Then, he snapped back to reality, telling himself he couldn't and shouldn't enjoy such a disgusting practice. However, he had to admit that being fat and content had an upside. He couldn't decide what to do; should he enjoy it, or despise it?
Dorugremon, noticing his inner conflict, said, "Remember that if you don't enjoy it, you'll be able to leave, but you'll never experience this feeling again. Either way, you have to face the other snakes. If I were you, I'd enjoy this unique punishment."
After being goaded by Dorugremon, Armadillomon finally decided...
1232122.title: Bizarre Pleasure

12322.content:
"I like fruit, so I guess I'll go with the Eternal Fruits of Longing." He said, more confidently than he felt.
"Here's how it works." said Dorugremon grining, "You eat one fruit, said frui makes you gain 150 pounds, plus it give you a craving for the fruit. if you want more, you're going to need to eat through all th food in the next room. each item doubles your weight and makes you hungrier, will you do it willingly, or will I have to force you?"

123221.content:
A brief pulse of rebellion went through Armadillomon, but it was gone. He sighed and hanged his head. "Okay. I submit."

"Wonderful!" said Dorugremon, barring his large teeth in a horrible smile. "Now,let's get started, shall we?"

The Ultimate procured a banana and placed it in front of Armadillomon. Reluctantly, the rookie pealed it and began eating it slowly, eying the watchful Dorugremon nervously. Finally, he gulped down the last of the banana and waited. An ominous silenced followed.

"When's it going to happen?" Armadillomon asked after a long pause.

"OH, soon! Very soon!"

Armadillomon didn't like the way the Ultimate said those words. Was he hiding something else? Before the Digimon could ponder that, he felt a unnerving rumble from his stomach and then it all began!

Guilmon stirred from the snooze he'd been having, sat up on the dirt floor of his hut. Opening his eyes, he saw his partner, Takato grinning down at him.

131.title: Guilmon

1311.content:
The silence that followed seemed almost defining.

Then, just barley audible, a noise. Like the sound of wet rubber being pulled taught.

"Guilmon, do you hear that?" whispered Takato as he looked around for the source of the noise which was slowly growing louder.
"Not only that, Takato," replied Guilmon sounding a little tense, "I feel it, too."

Takato looked over at Guilmon and saw that he looked somewhat bigger that before. Peering through the dim light of the hut, Takato could see that Guilmon seemed to be standing up straighter than usual and he definitely looked thicker than before.

"What do ya mean?" asked Takato as he took a step towards Guilmon.

Takato could see now. Guilmons muscles seemed to have doubled in size. He no longer had the small paunch he'd always had. Instead there was a thick six-pack in its place. His legs were about a foot wide and his arms the same. In short it looked like he was about two hundred and fifty pounds of pure muscle.

"Wow! Guilmon, it really worked! I bet you're much stronger now."
"But Takato I still don't feel good." Guilmon wined.

Takato didn't understand at first, but then he saw it. Guilmons muscles were still growing! As Takato watched they seemed to almost double in size over the course of a minute. Guilmon had to be almost 500lbs. now and was starting to have trouble moving.


What now?
1311.title: Big Lizard

choices: He grew bigger than a house and burst over the roof.
The card grants the wishes of all those present.
13112.content:
"God, you are huge!" Takato gasped, taking a look at the big and over-muscled lizard.

"T-Takato," Guilmon talked with a changing voice, which started to sound deeper and tougher. "It's not stopping!"

Takato blinked and stepped back a bit. "Wh-what do you mean?!"

Soon, he was answered, Guilmon's body started to grow taller, a new pair of packs appeared over his belly, making a total of eight packs, his muscles all kept swelling and getting bigger. Guilmon felt as powerful as never in his life.

"This actually feels nice." Guilmon proclaimed, standing triple Takato's height.

"W-woah..." Takato admired the over-powered rookie. "You look like the strongest!"

"Really?" the lizard asking giving out a grin.

Suddenly, Rika and Renamon walked by, Guilmon turned at hearing them, which only made both girls bump with the mountain of muscles before them.

"Oww!" both said as they fell to the ground. "Who put that," they looked up and noticed the large Guilmon.

They suddenly were silent, Takato and Guilmon exchanged looks and sweatdropped.

Rika was speechless, Guilmon was very strong-looking, and she was getting horny just by looking on him.

As for Renamon, it was no different for her, she always loved tall huge muscular men, and she had one before her eyes.

"Are you alright... girls?" Takato asked silently.

Rika shook her head. "What-ever happened to Guilmon?!"

"We just used this wishing card, and he got stronger... I wished him to be like that." Takato explained.

Guilmon however, wasn't stopping from growing taller and stronger, he looked tougher and tougher with each passing minute.

"Well, it seems it's not stopping..." Renamon pointed out.

"Maybe if I swipe the card again..." said Takato, taking out his D-Arc and the wishing card.

He slashed, but nothing happened, he repeated, and didn't have much of a result, so he started to desperately slash and slash over 20+ times.

Guilmon suddenly growled, which stopped Takato from his slashing, he moaned a bit. "Ohhh..."

Guilmon mid-closed his eyes, then suddenly...
13112.title: Attention for Guilmon

131121.content:
Suddenly, there was a loud thud and everyone looked to see that Guilmon's head had finally hit the ceiling of the hut, and now it was starting to make cracks in it.

"Guilmon!" cried out Takato, "Are you okay boy?"

The muscular reptile digimon grunted as he looked down at his tamer, who appeared so much smaller now. Guilmon had to be at least four times Takato's height. The boy didn't even come up to his bulging calf muscles.

"I'm okay Takato. A bit scared, but okay. I just hope I won't grow anymore." Unfortunately, that was to no avail, as Guilmon's muscles became more firm and larger. He bent down on his knees and stomach to avoid destroying the hut, but in a matter of seconds his back and shoulders were pressing against the ceiling and the cracking continued.

Rika and Renamon looked up in awe. Right before their eyes, Guilmon, the dopey little digimon they had always known and respected, was now growing into a virtual titan of muscle and power. With his strength alone, he could probably wipe out any champion--even any ultimate level digimon.

Guilmon's tail pushed far back against one wall while his arms and legs began to push against the other walls. His humongous neck began to stretch out, forcing his large snout to push out towards Takato, who had little room left to move about within the hut.

"Takato!" cried Guilmon, "you've got to get out of here! Take the others and run away! If I can't stop growing, I could accidentally crush you all--and I won't let that happen!" The gigantic digimon moaned as his entire back now pushed against the ceiling, causing it to fracture and split in two.

"I'm not gonna leave you Guilmon!" replied Takato, "You're my partner, and what kind of digimon tamer would I be if I abandoned you?"

"Takato, we don't have time for this!" yelled Rika, "I know you care for Guilmon, but he's trying to protect you. At the rate he's growing, you'll end up--"

"Would you abandon Renamon if this was happening to her, Rika?" interrupted Takato, who had tears in his eyes now. Rika was left speechless. He did have a point. If this were happening to HER partner, she surely couldn't--no, she WOULDN'T ever dare abandon Renamon, even if it put her in imminent danger.

Suddenly, a large part of the ceiling collapsed and fell directly over Rika. Renamon, sensing this, quickly jumped towards Rika, tackling her and rolling her out of the way before the debris smashed into the ground.

"Renamon," Rika said softly, "thank you." Without her partner, she'd be dead right now.

"Don't mention it Rika." replied the fox digimon. She smiled for a second, but then realized that in another minute that the entire hut was going to collapse. "We have to get out of here now Rika." Rika nodded and yelled to Takato.

"Hey goggle-head, we're getting out of here, and I know that this hurts abandoning him, but Guilmon will be fine, so get your butt out of there!" With that, the duo was out the door and far from the hut.

But Takato wasn't listening. He merely hugged the muzzle of his titanic friend, tears streaming down the cheeks of his face. He felt ashamed to be crying like this. He hadn's cried this much since Guilmon first digivolved into Growlmon, and even though he looked big and scary, it was only a fraction of the intimidation that Guilmon's current size and power showed.

"If Guilmon's in trouble," thought Takato, "I'll be there for him, EVEN IF IT COSTS ME MY LIFE!" A moment later, as the building was ready to collapse, he heard a soft voice from somewhere close to him. It was Guilmon's voice.

"Takato, I know that you care about me. I'm greatful for that, but I can't let you do this. I care about you too much to let anything bad happen to you because of me. Don't worry about me, I'll be okay." The big simpleton smiled as he reached out a massive claw for Takato, gently holding him.

With Takato snatched gently in one arm, Guilmon cocked back the other arm, his muscles bulging as they did, and puched with all of his force a hole in the wall were Takato was just standing. The hole was a good ten feet high and several feet wide. The giant digimon then took one final look at his partner with a smile.

"Like I said, I'm not gonna let anything bad happen to you, tamer." He then pushed the arm holding Takato through the hole, which was relatively small to Guilmon at his current size, and gently let his tamer go. Takato fell softly onto the grass outside the hut and looked back as the giant arm grew and the hut itself began to give way altogether.

"Guilmon!" shouted the young boy as the hut nearly exploded, sending dust and debris everywhere. A big chunk of it nearly came falling towards Takato, but then a yellow blur snatched him away before it landed.

Takato looked to see just what had saved him at the last second and found himself in the arms of Renamon.

"You okay Takato?" she asked. Takato nodded yes. Once again the fox digimon saved the day. She released him on the ground and nodded to Rika a few feet away.

"Well, it's a good thing we stayed around or else you'd be as flat as a pancake right about now, goggle-head." stated the slightly-sassy female tamer.

"Yeah, thank you both." he answered back. With that, he turned towards the remains of the hut to see that the dust had cleared and now standing amongst the wreckage was a towering, muscular-built, god-like, fifty-foot Guilmon. His body was rippling with muscles and power. Every part of his body--his arms, legs, chest, theighs, neck, back, hind-end, claws and feet, even his tail was built to solid perfection. His yellow eyes had narrowed becoming shinier and more open and slightly changed to a nearly pure golden color. His defined mouth was filled with solid shining pearl white teeth that were sharper than any blade and harder than solid steel. His chest and stomach were colored in a pure snow white while the rest of his body was colored in a fiery bright red. His claws and toes were much thicker and sharper now as well. The markings on his body had grown with him as well, becoming darker and more well designed.

"Guilmon!" cried out Takato, "can you hear me Guilmon?"

With that, the titan of a digimon turned towards where the sound came from. Apparently, that card also heightened Guilmon's hearing, sight, smell, and touch as well as his overall size and strength. He looked down to see what looked at first like three dolls a few yards away. But when he squinted his eyes, he found them to be Takato, Renamon, and Rika.

"Hi Takato, I can hear you!" he shouted, not knowing how loud his voice was now, as it caused a small quake in the area and shook the trees, causing entire flocks of birds to take to the skies. Takato was in shock of Guilmon's voice alone, and wondered just how powerful was he now.

Guilmon looked back and was glad to see his partner safe from harm, when he realized one thing: He had stopped growing--for the time being anyway. It seemed as though the card's power had worn off, but you could never be sure. With that he walked over towards the gang gently, for he also knew that his new size meant extra weight--by a couple tens (if not hundreds) of tons in this case--which meant possible damage even at the slightest gesture. It was when he was right in front of them that something a few feet off in the forest came out, which turned out to be...

Takato though that Guilmon was walking to try to lose the weight. Then he heard his 6000 ton digimon say, "I'm going for some food, I'm still majorly hungry, hmm maybe the card didn't work after all. I need FOOD!"

A few minutes later Takato exploded out of their den because he grew so fat. While Guilmon's tail was, by now bigger than a house, and he was still growing. Anyway

131221222.content:
Guilmon stared down upon the abandoned section of the city. It had been a year since the wishing card had been swiped and he and Takato were now in good-feeling hell because of it. They were now the only features left on what used to be the park, two giant red, draconic blobs of fat. When had wished he never thought it would come to this, he and Takato were now trapped as fat blobs forever, and the range of their food absorption was spread rapidly and would eventually cover the whole planet, leaving them as they are with only each other until the sun burns out.

The other Tamers had tried to help, emphasis on tried, but their efforts just caused them to grew twice as quickly. Takato didn't... take it very well and now mumbles to himself instead of talking to Guilmon. Guilmon again tried fruitlessly to move, he knew the wishing card and Takato D-Power was somewhere under him.

Takato started to sob. "Guilmon, please you aren't going to move, were going to stay here for the rest of our lives, always growing and I'll never be a human again." Takato broke down and sobbed loudly, causing buildings to shake and fall apart due to the volume.

"Don't worry Takato, we'll get out of this." Comforted the worried Guilmon, fear creeping into his voice.

"How? We don't have any chance any more!" Screeched Takato, that was another thing he gained, a high-pitched screech that had drove away everyone who came near him.

"We just will! I know it." Counters Guilmon. But he knew he was lying, he hadn't a foggiest clue as to how to get back to normal, or even if he wants too.

"Well?" Takato moaned pathetically. Guilmon just stared over his mountainous body.

"I don't want to be normal Takato..." Guilmon gurgled up a belch following his short reply. "I'm warm, I'm full! I'll never be hungry again...and we have each other!" A loud gurgle rumbled from the monstrous blob that was Guilmon's belly. Barely a second later thunderous flatulence blasted from under many tons of lard, shaking his whole body, as well as the ground below. Buildings crumbled and fell from the blast from the digi-fart. Guilmon grinned stupidly, truly enjoying the bulk he's earned.

Takato however, looked on in horror at the mass next to him that jiggled for half an hour from the blast. He stuffed his muzzle against his fat neck to block the smell, tears streaming down his face as he shakes his head in disbelief. "I'm trapped...I'm trapped."

Guilmon whimpers, hating to see his friend in such pain, ponders the situation longer.

Takato felt the D-Arc start to vibrate in his hand, and he had to hold on tight to keep it from vibrating right out of his grasp. As he did, his body began to change, glowing red as he reverted back into a human, and sank into a sitting position on the ground.
Guilmon sniffed him curiously, and then nuzzled him. "Sorry, Takatomon. I really thought you'd like being so big..."
Takato was a little shaky after having transformed so drastically in such a short time, but he managed to lift his hand and pat Guilmon on the snout. "It's okay, boy, I know you meant well." It took him a minute to get to his feet, and then he looked down at the D-Arc, and back at Guilmon.
"You know, we might still be able to use this. If you promise that you won't change someone into something they don't want to be!" He added sternly, and Guilmon nodded eagerly.
"I promise, Takatomon!" With that settled, they had to decide who would be changed, and into what.

Guilmons ears picked up a sound he hadn't heard in a while.

Takatomon 'wasn't' crying.

"Takato. Are you ok?"

"Yeah buddy! Why wouldn't I be?" Takato said in an all to enthusiastic voice.

"Well, because were fat. I thought you didn't like it right?" Guilmon said carefully.

It's like lying in an oceon of pudding, I never have to move, I'm never hungry like you said and I'm a digimon! Life is sweet and I'm loving every second of it."

Guilmon smiled. Finally his tamer had seen the light. Now they could be fat and happy together forever.

"I only got one problem." Said Takato in all seriousness.

"Huh." Said Guilmon.

"What'll we do when weve eaten all the food in the world. I mean we must have eaten a lot of it already and no more can be made if people arn't around to grow or make it."

Guilmons eyes would have widened if they weren't pressed shut by the fat of his face holding them shut. Takato was right! With no one to grow crops or raise aniomals then theyre was no more food. They couldn't absorb anything for some reason unless it had been processed into food.

That wasn't fair, he didn't want to stop getting bigger or get hungry again. He wanted to get fatter and fatter forever with Takato.

If he was thinner Guilmon would have done an immitation of a childs temper tantrum, his attempts to stomp his feet in a rage once more send his mountainous body jiggling, resulting in another swipe of the card.

Takato felt his digimons quaking and heard his childish complaints about the unfairness of it all. He chuckled.

"I know buddy, but what can we do. The cards gone so it's not like we can just wish that we..."

Earth had returned to the way it was once more.

Plants grew.

Animals thrived.

People lived.

The three moons ci......you already know where I'm going with this dont you?

Yes it's true. Due to the loss of the need to eat to gain mass the otther tamers and the scientists were unable to stop their growth. Not that the two cared mind you. They were far to content with their gain to wont it stopped.

That raised the problem of what to do with them, given enough time something that endlessly expand's that fast would eventually cover the planet.

The solution was obvious.

Their digital bodies required no oxygen, they were uneffected by the vaccum of space. So......the earth got two new moons.

Two new 'inhabited' moons.

Takato' s parents absolutly refused to be seperated from their boy....no matter how ridiculously huge he was. So he was colonised. And when I say colonised I mean it, not ever mother could say that their son has a city the size of Tokyo built on his neck fat. And one as big as new work on the left side of his chest.

Not that any would want to.

Eventually when they had to be moved further away when they grew as big as the earth the scientists did manage to stabilise the growth, but were never able to reverse it.

Again the two were quite comfertable with this.
131221222222112.title: The red planet(s)

1321.content:
Rika entered her room to find Renamon heaving some weights that she found in a dusty old box. She was sweating and huffing as she lifted a reasonably large dumbbell up and down.

"Where'd you find all that?" Rika asked.

"I found them in the basement, Rika." Renamon grunted. Rika frowned, not remembering any weights in her house. They must've been left behind by a previous tenant of the house. The weights were odd and had weird ancient Japanese text carved into them.

"These are pretty old weights. I never knew the ancient Japanese worked out," Rika murmured.

"At least they give a good workout. Besides you did say I should get stronger," Renamon huffed as she set the dumbbell down. She then sat on the floor, wiping her sweat with a towel. She noticed that Rika was looking at her funny.

"Renamon, I never noticed you..."
1321.title: Morning workout

choices: "Sure, go ahead. Just be careful, okay? These seem a little... off... to me."
"I'd prefer that you didn't.  I want to look up the meaning of that
"Just let me try them out some too occasionally, alright?"
13212.content:
"Renamon, I never noticed you had such an addiction to fitness."

Renamon grinned. That in itself was an unusual occurance for her, especially since the grin was a cocky, happy grin that she never wore unless she was in battle.

"It's funny... I never knew I did either. But ever since I found these weights," she said, gesturing to the set of dumbells, barbells, and various other exercise equipment all around her, "I've felt like I could do anything. I feel stronger already, Rika. Look."

She kneeled next to Rika and flexed her arm. Rika was surprised when she saw a visible bulge in Renamon's bicep. She felt Renamon's arm and gasped. It was solid, like stone, with very little give to it underneath the fox Digimon's soft fur.

"Wow..." Rika said.

Renamon grinned again. "Isn't this great? I can get as strong as I want without the guilt of having to download other Digimon to do it," she said, immediately regretting it as it brought back bad memories of what the two of them did

Rika didn't comment on it. Instead, she just nodded and said, "Yeah! This is a great way to do it."

Renamon gave her a hopeful look. "So I can work out with these weights?"

Rika looked thoughtful for a moment. It was true that both she and Renamon desired her to be stronger, but still, that writing bothered her a little.

Renamon, seeing the look on her face, nodded. "If you don't want me to use these, I won't. I can find other ways to be strong for you, Rika."

Rika shook her head, smiling. "Renamon, I just want you to be safe and happy, that's all. Strength is just a bonus now, as far as I'm concerned."

Renamon grinned back at her and ruffled her Tamer's hair. Rika giggled, and said...

"As for the weights, well..."

Renamon shook her head. "Not that late. I'm just going to do a few more reps with the barbells before I come up."

Rika nodded and went back upstairs as Renamon picked up a barbell and started doing lifts, taking deep, huffing breaths as she did. Rika looked back for a moment to smile at her partner.

For a moment, she thought that Renamon's muscles were bulging with each rep of the barbell, the text flashing with each lift. But she quickly dismissed the thought and went upstairs.

Several minutes later, Renamon came back up, smiling and feeling good. But when Rika saw her, she nearly gagged on her eggs because...

Rika coughed a few times to clear her throat, but even afterwards, stopped herself from babbling at the changes Renamon had undergone, unable to form a decent sentence in her head. Even so, Renamon simply stood and gave Rena a confused look.

"Is something wrong, Rika?" She took a couple of steps towards the table, the muscles beneath her yellow fur rippled lightly with the standard exertions walking entailed, but she seemed completely oblivious to the change. She sat down next to Rena

Rika blinked a few times and then frowned, pointing her index finger close to the newly buffed digimon "'Something wrong?' Renamon, haven't you even looked at yourself yet?"
Renamon was crafty, much like the real life animal, the fox, she shared some features with, and smirked
"Oh, come on, Rika...I've been around you long enough to have heard THAT joke. The second I'd look down you would flick my nose"

"I'm not joking, Renamon, look! You never had THOSE a few minutes ago" Rika half-shouted, poking Renamon in the now well formed abs beneath the soft white fur, and Rena looked, gasping.

"What in blazes..." she saw her bulkier thighs and arms, her shoulders had grown broader....in fact, she swore she must have become slightly wider all over to assist in the bulking up of muscle.

"That's really weird...it must be those weird training weights, I told you they were strange. I'm gonna get rid of them before they do anything else" Rika stood up, but Renamon quickly grabbed Rika's wrist

"You know, maybe....
1321211.title: Oblivious changes

choices: What are Takato and Guilmon up to?
13212112.content:
"You know, maybe we should research on those letterings before we decide what to do." said the yellow buffed fox digimon.

Rika shrugged. She didn't feel comfortable messing with those weights anymore than they already were. Indeed, Renamon appeared stronger from using them, but what if it changed her. Maybe not instantly, but little by little until she became barbaric and obsessed only with strength. A small droplet formed in each of Rika's eyes from the thought of that, and one of them ran down her cheek.

Renamon saw this and gently brought a finger to the girl's cheek, catching the tear. She was getting a feeling from her tamer just how worried she was for her digimon's safety. She was about to speak again when Rika interrupted.

"Maybe you're right. I mean, I still don't trust those weights , but maybe we can find out just how they work or what they're full potential is or something like that--just as long as we're careful."

"Of course, Rika. I really do appreciate you taking this into consideration." said Renamon. Slowly she walked over to the girl and placed he somewhat larger arms around her, gently hugging her. Rika returned the favor and hugged back in return.

"Well," said Rika, "I think I'm going to go over and see what the others are up to today. Maybe I'll go and pay Goggle-Head a visit as well. Then later on we'll see what we can dig up on those weird markings, okay?"

"Sure." answered Renamon gently. Rika began to make her way to the back door to get her bike and was just making it out of the house and into the street when Renamon called out.

"Hey, Rika." Rika turned around in response, stopping her bike.

"Thanks again. And don't worry, I promise you, I won't let these weights come between our friendship. That's a promise."

Rika simply smiled back and waved off as she continued pedaling out of sight. She knew Renamon cared deeply for her and felt as though she would always take her feelings into consideration, even if it didn't show a lot of the time.

Renamon smiled as she returned to the house. She walked back down to the basement, where she saw those same weights lying on the ground. She walked over to them, picked one up and started to lift it up and down. After a few minutes of lifting, she noticed something on the weight itself glow. It was the incantations. They lit up and caused the whole room to fill up with light. Renamon dropped the weight in surprise and was shocked as the other ones started to light up as well.

Bright white light overtook the digimon as she covered her face. There seemed to be no end to it, but after about another minute, in an instant, the light disappeared. Renamon brought down her arms and looked around in shock and awe. Nothing had happened to the basement or the weights themselves. Everything appeared normal.

"What is going on here?" thought the digimon to herself. "Maybe Rika's right about these things after all. Well, I'm definitely going to take a break for a while and see what we can dig up about these weights tonight."

"You do that, my little pet. Nothing will save you when the time comes." said a dark voice from nowhere.

Renamon gasped. "Who is there? Who are you?" she barked out. "Just how do you know about these things?"

"Don't you worry, my dear. When the time comes, all will be answered and you will do my bidding. Until then I must be going now." The voice left with an echoing cackle.

"Wait! Come back!" shouted Renamon. But there was no answer. The dark presence had come and gone. The digimon was scared somewhat. She hadn't felt a presence this dark and wicked since the D-Reaper or the Parasimon. "I better let Rika know as soon as possible." she muttered.

Renamon ran out the basement and out the front door, ready to find Rika. However, when she ran out the front door, she smashed her head against the doorway. When she came to a few seconds later, she saw the big gaping hole that was a good three or four inches tall now. There were also cracks and bents along the sides of the doorway too from her massive arms. She had just damaged Rika's doorway without even knowing it or feeling a thing!

"My god." she whispered. She looked at her surroundings and noticed her arms, legs, chest, and overall body had become slightly more muscular than a few minutes ago. She could see veins and bulges of muscle along her body and she wasn't even flexing them. This was beyond belief. Her knew muscles also gave her a few more inches in height and made her a tad bit wider as well.

"Got to find Rika--NOW." said Renamon as she jumped high into the clear blue sky. Time was of the essence.

As Renamon looked for Rika, Rika herself began to experience a strange voice in her head.

~You love the idea of Renamon getting stronger,~ said a voice in her head. Rika had to admit, that yes, this was true.

~She looked gorgeous with all her muscles,~ said the voice. Rika blushed, admitting again that feeling Renamon's rock-hard body had been amazing.

~You want Renamon to become HUGE, a hulking mountain of muscle devoted to your every whim,~ said the voice. Rika gasped softly, a vision overtaking her of a fifty-foot high Renamon, huge and bulging with muscle, looming over the street, Rika herself musclebound and in royal regalia, riding on her loyal servant's fur collar, as people bowed to her.

Rika barely noticed as something began to take root in her mind, her old ambitions flaring up again. She began to make plans on how to trick Renamon into using the weights some more, wanting her to become huge...

1322.content:
Renamon and her tamer Rika were watching TV one night with their grandmother, it had been about a year since the defeat of D reaper, and the digimon were finally able to return to the real world. Rika was surprised to see her mother in a commercial for, of all things, mcdonalds resturants.

"I guess the modeling industry is a bit slow this season, ah well, at least she's still in TV."

Rika munched on some popcorn as her mother came in, hauling several bags of mcdonalds food.

"Ugh, its not bad enough that I have to lower myself to doing commercials, but they have to force me to bring home the swill as well. is there no justice in the world?"

Rika laughed, "Oh relax mom, just throw it out."

Rika's mom sat dowmn and sighed. "I cant. If I throw it out Ill lose the commercial spot, and I cant afford to lose this job right now."

"Then eat it."

"Are you insane? eating this garbage is a good way to gain 20 pounds."

"Then I'LL eat it."

"Rika Nonoka you'll do no such thing, I dont care if you dont want to be a model or not, but Ill be dammed if Im going to let you become a fat laden hog."

Rika looked over at her grandmother, who put her hands up in defense.

"Dont look at me, I cant eat that stuff, bad heart."

"Well thats just great, we got to get this stuff eaten, but no one will eat it, now what?"

after a few seconds of thought, Rika, her mother and grandmother turned to Renamon.

"What, me?"

"Sure, why not? Im sure it cant be that bad. Just eat it, and then mom can say she ate it."

Renamon sighed, she knew it was impossible to argue with Rika when she got like this, so she reluctantly grabbed a bag, unwrapped a burger, and sunk her teeth in.

But what Renamon didnt know....
1322.title: Supersize me

13221.content:
"Hey this isn't half bad." Renamon mumbled through the burger. "But I hope you won't mind if I choose to eat in privacy."
"Not at all, Renamon." Rika replied. "You enjoy and join us when you feel like it."

Renamon nodded. "I like the way this feels, Rika," she said, hefting one of her plump breasts. "It's warm, it's comfortable... Plus, the food is delicious."

Renamon rolled her eyes. She didn't really understand the trend of rebellion in human youths, but whatever made Rika happy. And in this case, what made Rika happy also made her happy, since she didn't have to lose her lovely fat.

Rika looked at Renamon thoughtfully, and said, "If you're going to stay fat, then there's really only one thing to do."

"Now," Rika said, adopting her 'This is how things are going to happen no matter what' tone, "in order to make sure that you get maximum fatness out of this, we are going to put you on a very special diet."

"RIKA!" Renamon bellowed, thundering down the stairs. Rika blinked in surprise. She heard Renamon coming long before she yelled, the Digimon was so heavy by now that her steps made very audible thuds. But that still didn't prepare Rika for the sight of her friend and partner coming towards her, fattened up into immensity. So stunned was she, that Rika didn't react in time to prevent the angry and somewhat frightened Digimon from lifting her up by the collar of her shirt and slamming her against the wall.

"Rika, what did that food do to me?!" Renamon said, the anger and fear evident in her eyes, "What's happened to me?"

Rika, while her shoulder hurt from the slam, wasn't worried. This was RENAMON. "Calm down and I'll explain as best I can."

Renamon shook her head. "NO! You explain right now or I'll... I'll!!"

Rika just smirked and folded her arms. "You'll what?"

Renamon shivered for a moment, and set Rika down gently. "I'm sorry... It's just... Nothing like this has ever happened to me before."

Rika rubbed her shoulder, chuckling softly. She looked around quickly, to see if her mother or grandmother were awake yet. "I can imagine. Now sit down and tell me what you know."

Renamon nodded, realizing for the first time that the effort of storming out here had tired her out. Slowly, she sat down on the steps leading into the TV room where Rika was. She sighed, and said,

"I don't know much about what happened. I tried some of that food you gave me and ended up eating all of it. Then, about a few seconds after I finished, I just fell over, going to sleep in an instant. I woke up like this."

Rika looked thoughtful for a moment, and sat down next to her partner as she thought. Almost without knowning, Rika leaned over, pressing her head against Renamon's belly. The fat fox Digimon didn't stop her, as she had done this before in thoughtful moments, although it did feel a little awkward with her new girth.

After a few moments, Rika said, "Maybe it was something in the food. Normally, you just eat healthier stuff."

Renamon frowned, her chubby face making the expression look cute. "Maybe," she said, "But what could make me this fat?"

Rika scowled. "I don't know. But don't worry, I'll find out somehow."

She sighed, and blinked, as Renamon's belly rumbled loudly. She grinned, as Renamon blushed. "Sorry," she said, "I guess I'm hungry again."

Rika grinned, and poked Renamon's flabby gut. "Guess I better get you some food, then. After all, we want to keep up your girlish figure. I should probably get some breakfast as well."

At that thought, Renamon shivered again. "Could we try and figure something out first? Maybe call the guys and get their thoughts on this? After what happened last night, I'm afraid to eat again."

Rika frowned. She hadn't thought of that. What should she do? "Hmmm..."

At first neither Rika nor Renamon could understand what they were seeing. The bakery seemed alright, and yet the front window of the attached house had a large red... 'mass' just sagging out of it like a blob of pudding. It was only when Renamon caught sight of a few splotches of black on the red she realized what it was. "It's Guilmon..."

Seeing the looks they gave her partner, Rika was silently wishing she'd suggested covering Renamon’s exposed orbs.
         Thankfully the line was short and they managed to get the attention of Takato’s parents Takehiro and Yoshi, though she sometimes enjoyed being called Mai. Spotting Rika and Renamon, Yoshi stepped up to greet them.
         "Rika, Renamon, it's good to see you both again," she smiled, though from her eyes it was clear she didn't approve of Renamon’s 'full frontal exposure'.
         Renamon blushed and though not really embarrassed she made an attempt to cover herself with her arms. It barely did anything.
         "We're here to see Takato," Rika stated seeing the mother of her friend fidget a little, "Is everything alright?"
         "Oh everything's fine," the young mother smiled as she rubbed the back of her neck, "It's just... Something I can't quite put my finger on. Something's felt off all morning."
         "Well maybe we can talk about it with Takato," Rika suggested, "Is he home?"
         "You just missed him. He ran out somewhere but I think he said he'd be right back. If you want to wait for him that's fine."
         "If that's alright," Rika gave a soft bow and turned to go. Renamon was just about to do the same when her round belly let out a loud grumbling growl. The smells of fresh bread and pastries having gotten to her more than she realized.
         "Oh, here Renamon," Ms.Matsuki offered the vixen a tray of bread and sweet rolls. "It's all more than a day old anyway. We'll have to pitch it otherwise."
         "Oh I couldn't..." Renamon started, but seeing the look on the young mother’s face she nodded and smiled as she took the tray, "Thank you. I really appreciate it."
         The girls exited the side door into the house and made their way to the front living room. The sight that awaited them was both expected and under estimated.
         Guilmon was big. Really big. Very big. Just... Big.
         He barely resembled the red dino he'd been before. Now his mass rose almost to the ceiling and sagged out to cover half the floor. Part of his but was what they'd seen sagging out the window, his cone of fat tail curling slightly above it against the wall. He wobbled and gurgled as he rested in yards of his own flab, both legs absorbed into thick dimpling swaths of it and arms close to doing the same with only claw-tips to be seen. His head was barely visible, the ears poking out above cheeks the size of a beachball and the bottom of his head pressed close into his fat. The TV had been scooped up by his belly now bigger than a car and rested in his folds as he sat watching it. He had to be more than a ton of scaly flab at the very least.
         Renamon almost dropped the tray in amazement looking at his enormity. Rika couldn't quite seem to form words. Fortunately Guilmon spoke first.
         "Hey Rika, oh hey Renamon," Guilmon’s voice sound similar but definitely had a more 'adult' tone to it, "I see you're looking a bit bigger too. Did you eat a burger as well?"
         "Um, yeah, last night right before I brought them over for you," Renamon was trying hard to hide the strange feelings she had running up and down her body, "Did you get this big from those burgers?"
         "And the fries, and the nuggets," Guilmon chuckled which sent his whole form rolling and wobbling, "All that in one bag. And it's amazing, I can think so much clearer now. I feel like a new 'mon."
         "You look like you're the size of twenty at least," Rika muttered, "Guilmon, where's Takato? We need to talk to him about this."
         "Oh I just sent him out. He's been so agreeable all morning, doing whatever I ask. Sure he had a little trouble at first but I talked to him and convinced him to relax about it."
         "You just convinced him to relax?" Renamon looked a little suspicious, "Guilmon, where did you send Takato to?"
         "To the local burger palace," the big mass smiled around his huge cheeks, "I asked him to pick me up some more burgers. Just two or three dozen, I just was craving more for some reason."
         Rika looked horrified, "Renamon, if he eats that much..."
         She couldn't even get it out as a moment later the door slammed and footsteps approached the living room.
         "Guilmon, I'm home," Takato’s voice echoed down the hall.
         "Renamon we have to do something!"
