"I was gonna suggest changing mom and grandma first," Rikamon began, "but they're out shopping today, and, knowing mom, they won't be home until this evening. Let's change Henry into a Terriermon. His house is a lot closer than Takato's, anyway."

         "That's a great idea," Renamon said happily. "I can just imagine how he'll react to that." She pictured Henry turning into a big, fat bunny and giggled.

         The two flabby vixens waddled into the kitchen where they found that Rumiko had left some more fast food on the table.

         "More food," Rikamon asked? "That gives me another great idea; if we bring this food with us, we can make Terriermon bigger and stronger like you, Renamon. Then the four of us can be big, fat, and powerful together!"

         Renamon's tail began wagging at that thought. "You have some of the best ideas ever, Rikamon," she said smiling. She then grabbed as many bags as she could carry. "Let's teleport over to Henry's place; it'll be much faster and we won't draw any attention to ourselves that way."

         "Sounds good to me," Rikamon said, grabbing the rest of the food.

         After Renamon gave Rikamon a brief lesson on how to use her teleportation abilities, the fat vixens were on their way.

~~~


         Henry sat in his room using his computer while Terriermon rested on Henry's bed watching TV. Henry's parents, Suzie and Lopmon were all out for the day, so Henry and Terriermon had the whole house to themselves. Terriermon was enjoying himself; Henry, on the other hand was not.

         "Who made this ridiculous quiz?!" He shouted in frustration. He had decided to take a quiz on Digimon trivia, and was starting to regret his decision. The quiz had started out fairly straightforward with questions like:

"Which of the following Digimon has the Special Skill 'Terra Force?'

A: HiAndromon
B: WarGreymon
C: Rosemon
D: Machinedramon"

"Which of the following Digimon is NOT a Data Type?

A: Renamon
B: Lillymon
C: MachGaogamon
D: Gatomon"

         And;

"Which of the following Digimon is a Digivolution of Veemon (directly or indirectly)?
A: Magnamon
B: Flamedramon
C: UlforceVeedramon
D: All of the above"

         But it had started asking questions of a more arbitrary nature, such as:

"TigerVespamon's name is derived from the scientific name of the Asian Giant Hornet. True or False?"

         "A better question would be 'why are you even taking that quiz if it's so ridiculous,'" Terriermon asked? "It's not like anyone's forcing you to take it."

         "Well," Henry began, "I had no idea this quiz would be this ridiculous for, one thing. Second, I really want to see just how extensive my knowledge of Digimon is." He turned his attention back to the quiz. "Ok, what kind of question is this? This is just stupid!"

         Just before saying that, Rikamon and Renamon teleported into the room. "Isn't that basically the nature of trivia in general" Rikamon asked, looking at the screen?

         "Maybe," Henry replied, briefly glancing at the fat vixens and then back to screen, "but this question is downright unfair. It's showing me picture of an orange, reptilian Digimon's foot and asking me to identify what Digimon it is, but there are four different Digimon it could be: Agumon; Greymon; MetalGreymon; and WarGreymon. And I know trivia questions can be a bit obtuse, but this is like taking your driver's test and finding the question: 'You're driving down the road at 40 miles an hour, an ambulance is fast approaching on the wrong side of the road, and someone in the backseat has a gun to your head. What do you do?' With the correct answer being: 'You die like a man for the glory of Mother Russia.'" Henry then blinked a few times, finally having registered what he had seen when he glanced at the girls, and slowly turned his head to look at them again.

         "Hi, Henry," Renamon smiled. We've got quite a bit to tell you."

         "Y-y-yeah. You can say that again," Henry flusteredly responded, simultaneously confused, scared, intrigued, and mildly aroused by what he was looking at. "And I have a lot of things to ask: why is Rika a Digimon now; why are you both so fat; what's all the food for; and what's going on here?"

         "Ok," Rikamon began, idly handing Terriermon a bag of food, which the digital rabbit began eating from. "I'll answer your questions in order. 1st question: Renamon now has an ability to turn humans into Digimon and used it to turn me into a Renamon like her. 2nd question: the modelling business is slow right now, so mom's turned to showing up in fast food commercials, and has been given free food which I gave Renamon. It made her fat and somehow gave her that new power I mentioned earlier, which had a side effect of making me fat like her. 3rd question: we figured we could give some of this food to Terriermon to make him fatter and stronger. Speaking of which, 4th question: Renamon shared some of that food with Guilmon and he's somehow a Mega Digimon now. On top of that, Renamon's a low-level champion now, and has that new power. So we're here to make Terriermon stronger with food, and use Renamon's new power to turn you into a Terriermon."

         Henry was taken aback by how much information Rikamon had just given him; it was far more than he was expecting to say the least. "That's quite a lot to take in. I don't really know how to-- Wait, you're gonna do WHAT to me?!"

         "You heard her," Renamon smirked. She placed the food she was carrying on Henry's bed, pointed her finger at Henry and closed her eyes. "Zen Form!" Her body began glowing, and a beam of light shot from her finger, engulfing Henry. "Form of... a Terriermon!" Renamon smiled as Henry's body began to change: his skin started turning into white fur with green markings; his ears grew long enough to reach his thighs; a short horn grew out from his forehead; and his body started to fatten up as well, stopping only when he was as fat as Rikamon. The light then faded and Henry's transformation stopped.

         "You're looking pretty good, Henry," Terriermon smirked. While he was eating, his own body had changed to the point where he was as tall as Gargomon, and just as fat as Renamon. He then looked over himself. "Wow, and so am I."

         "Wow, you've certainly grown," Renamon said to Terriermon. "You're as tall as Gargomon, and probably just as strong, too." Terriermon blushed at the compliment, and blushed even brighter when Renamon began rubbing his belly.

         Henry looked at his new body in the mirror hanging on his wall. He lifted his belly and jiggled it in his paws, barely able to comprehend that all that jiggling flab was now a part of him. He felt...
13223133212.title: Henrymon is born.

choices: "You need some help with that erection."
"We should share this gift with Takato."
"We should share this gift with Jeri."
"Let's get some more food. I'm hungry, in more ways than one."
132231332121.content:
Some conflicting thoughts were going through Henry's mind. On the one hand, he'd be lying to himself and the other Digimon in the room if he said that he didn't like the feeling of his soft, velvety fur and squishy, jiggly flab, the latter of which he even found a bit arousing. Not to mention it was intriguing to think that a human could be turned into a Digimon at all. Is this only possible because Rika and I have Biomerged with our partners, or can ANY human be turned into Digimon, he thought? On the other hand, the fact that he was so easily going along with it was a bit disconcerting. Not to mention he had no idea how his parents would react to seeing that their son had transformed into a fat, anthropomorphic, digital rabbit. Suzie would probably be happy to see that her big brother was now a big, soft rabbit, but that wasn't really putting his mind at ease.

         "How's it feel to be a soft rabbit, 'Henrymon,'" Rikamon asked? "I bet it feels nicer than being a hard, metallic one."

         "Well," Henry replied, paying no mind to the nickname the vixen had just given him, "this warm, soft fur DOES feel nicer than MegaGargomon's cold, hard armor. And I'd be lying if I said I didn't feel calm and relaxed in this body."

         "I imagine you'd feel more relaxed as a plush toy than you would as a weapon to surpass Metal Gear," the ever-snarky Terriermon said, giggling.

         "Very funny," Henry rolled his eyes. "But what worries me is just how calm and relaxed I am. I can't tell if I'm simply loosening up bit, or if my mind was in some way altered by the transformation, and, if the latter, I can't help but worry if your minds were affected too. I think would should have Hypnos check us over and, if nothing else, at least see if anything bad's happening to us."

         "Altered our minds," Rikamon asked? "Henry, did you even listen to what you just said? The fact that you're even slightly worried about this should be proof enough that your mind is still completely intact. If you were completely calm about this, then maybe - keyword "maybe" - that would mean our minds were altered, but, as you said, even that could just mean that you're just loosening up a bit, so it wouldn't be THAT concerning. Besides, I can tell that you're enjoying this as much as I am."

         "W-what do you mean," Henry asked? Rikamon's tone in her last sentence was bit more... seductive than he was expecting. "And, for that matter, how can you tell?"

         "Well," Rikamon said, walking over to Henry while seductively swinging her hips, "you took biology with me, so I know you know this, but I guess I'll have to remind you about it. When animals are sexually aroused, they give off pheromones that other animals can smell. Humans once had the ability to smell them too, but, thanks to evolution, that ability has been lost to time."

         "That explains why humans are always playing head games with each other instead of making love," Renamon joked.

         "And what does that have to do with anything," Henry asked? He didn't like where the conversation was going.

         "In case it wasn't obvious," Rikamon began, now having pressed her flabby body up against Henry's, "you're now a rabbit and I'm now a vixen. With my new canine nose, I can smell your arousal clear as day. Hell, I could smell it the moment you saw us. I'm fully aware that you want these puppies." She then lifted her coconut-sized breasts up to the poor bunny's face.

         Henry blushed as red as a tomato; this was a lot to handle. In recent years, he had discovered that he was a furry and that he was more into furry porn (including Digimon related furry porn) than he wanted anyone to know, and now he felt like one of his furry porn fantasies had come to life. Ever since Rikamon and Renamon had arrived, he was very quickly learning that he had a fetish for big bellies and the feeling of Rikamon pressing her belly into his own was quite a turn-on for him. Rikamon was pressing all of his buttons, and he was simultaneously loving and hating it. He could feel his growing erection pressing into his belly, making him grateful that his belly at least provided him some modesty; at least he didn't have to worry about getting charged with Public Indecency if he left the house in his new body. "Ok Rikamon, you win; I'm turned on by all of this." He hoped that admitting this would make Rikamon relent with with her sexual advances, which thankfully, it did.

         "I'm glad you see it my way, Henrymon," Rikamon said pulling away from the horny bunny. "I think now you can see why Renamon and I are so calm about all this; our minds don't need to be altered to know that we like how all this feels." Renamon nodded in agreement with her partner's statement.

         "I guess I can get used to this, and being called 'Henrymon,'" Henrymon said, defeated. "Can we at least go see Yamaki later and find out how this is all possible?"

         Rikamon smiled. "We can do that. Right now, I think..."
132231332121.title: A Conflicted Rabbit

choices: Kazu, Kenta, and their Digimon pass by.
1322313321212.content:
"Takato should be the next one we give this gift to," Rikamon smiled. "And," she reached between her breasts and pulled out a pocketbook, giggling at the fact that her cleavage could be used as a purse, "as an added bonus, we can get some baked goods from his family's bakery while we're there." All four Digimon's bellies growled at the mention of food.

         "Ok," Henrymon sighed. "I'd better write a note letting my parents know I had to go out with Terriermon." He waddled out of the room and wrote a note, which he left on the kitchen table. "There," he waddled back into the room with the others. "My parents took Suzie and Lopmon to visit some friends in Shibuya, so they probably won't be home until this evening, but I should still let them know that I left if they come home early."

         "That's very thoughtful of you, Henrymon," Renamon said, picking up the food she had placed on Henrymon's bed moments prior. "Now then, grab one of our paws," she gestured to Rikamon, "and we'll teleport to Takato's house." Henrymon and Terriermon grabbed the vixens' paws, and the obese quartet were on their way.

~~~


         The obese Digimon arrived at the Matsuki bakery and waddled inside. The were only one of two customers inside at that moment (which suited the Digimon just fine), but Takato and Guilmon were nowhere to be seen; just Takato's parents, Yoshie and Takehiro.

         "Hello," Yoshie greeted the Digimon, likely recognizing Rikamon and Henrymon because they still had their human hair.

         "Hi, Mrs. Matsuki," Henrymon nervously said. "Is Takato around? We've got a few things to talk to him about."

         "Sorry," Takehiro answered. "He asked us to help him take Guilmon over to the park a few hours ago."

         "I see," Rikamon sighed. At least she could get some treats while she was there. She looked at some very big cakes behind the counter; each one was big enough to feed ten people... or two or three obese Digimon. And there a lot of doughnuts on sale for about ¥50 apiece. "How much for three of those cakes and four dozen doughnuts?" She pulled some money out of her pocketbook.

         "That's quite a lot of sweets, Rika," Yoshie said. "What's the occasion; throwing a party?"

         "I guess you could say that," Rikamon replied.

         "Ok. Well three large cakes and four dozen doughnuts would round out too..." Yoshie punched some numbers into the cash register. "Ah yes, that would round out to about ¥7,230."

(Author's Note: That rounds out to about $66.52 USD)

         "Hmm," Rikamon put a paw to her chin. "That's much cheaper than I was expecting." She paid for the baked goods, and Yoshie gave them to her in very large bags. "Thank you, Mrs. Matsuki." She bowed as much as she could with her belly in the way.

         "You're most welcome, Rika," Yoshie smiled. With that, the four obese Digimon waddled outside.

         "Jeez, Rikamon," Terriermon said. "How can you afford to spend that much yen at once?"

         "Well," Rikamon smirked, putting her pocket book back between her breasts, "between my mom's successful modelling career and my own winnings at Digimon card tournaments, my family has plenty of money. Besides, if we're going to turn Takato and the others into fat Digimon like us, it helps to have as much food as possible. And knowing Takato, he probably already brought as much bread to Guilmon's old hideout as possible. Anyway, let's hurry up and get to the park."

         Once again, the obese Digimon held paws and teleported away.

~~~


         The four Digimon arrived just outside of Guilmon's old hideout, and it seemed much bigger than it was when they first saw it; it had gone from a small stone hut built into the side of a hill, to a small stone hut built into the side of a hill with a house-sized room dug into the back, complete with a tile floor, wood paneling on the walls, and a wooden ceiling. On top of having a much larger room, there were some furnishings such as - among other things - a door, some beds, a mirror, a space heater, a couch, a table, and even a half-bath, bizarrely.

         "Someone's been doing some renovations in the six years since the D-Reaper incident," the ever-snarky Terriermon said. He and the other Digimon waddled inside and saw Guilmon eating from a pile of bread as big as he was while Takato rubbed his massive belly.

         Takato looked over at the four Digimon and was clearly surprised by what he saw. "Whoa, what happened to you guys?"

         "Well," Rikamon began, "Renamon apparently has a new move that lets her turn humans into Digimon and makes them fat in the process. Actually, I'm wondering if Guilmon and Terriermon have the same ability. Anyway, she used it on me, I decided I liked being an obese Digimon, and we decided to share this gift with the others, starting with Henry." She pointed to the blushing Henrymon.

         "Wait a minute, you got Henry to go along with this?" Takato blinked a few times. "How did you get him agree to this? Wouldn't he be freaking out and wanting to talk to Yamaki about this?"

         Henrymon blushed even more. "Well, y-you see..."

         "Rikamon brought one of Henrymon's furry porn fantasies to life by teasing him with her tits," Terriermon said bluntly. Rikamon and Renamon giggled.

         Henrymon's entire face turned bright red; his secret was out. "Thanks, Mr. Smooth."

         Takato blinked a few more times; Henry being into furry porn was definitely not something expected to learn when he woke up that morning. Then again, he also didn't expect Guilmon to grow to the size of a car or become a Mega just by eating fast food, and he also didn't expect to see Rika and Henry become obese Digimon and start calling themselves "Rikamon" and "Henrymon." His eyes widened a bit when he realized something. "Wait, are you guy here to turn me into a Guilmon? Because, I'd actually like that a lot."

         "That's right, Takato," Renamon smiled. She put down the food she was still carrying, pointed her paw finger at Takato and closed her eyes. "Zen Form!" Her body began glowing, and a beam of light shot from her finger, engulfing Takato. "Form of... a Guilmon!" Renamon smiled as Takato body began changing: red and white scales covered his skin; his human ears changed to bat wing-like ones and moved to the top of his head; his face elongated into a reptilian muzzle; and the Digital Hazard symbol appeared on his belly, which began to fatten up, stopping only when he was a fat as Rikamon and Henrymon. Then the light faded and Takato's transformation completed.

         "Takatomon is a Guilmon like me?" Guilmon giggled excitedly; his best friend was just like him now, and he couldn't have been happier for it.

         "That I am, boy," Takato smiled. "I really am Takatomon now." The two obese dinosaurs hugged each other tightly and nuzzled each other's cheeks.

         "That's the most precious thing I've seen in quite a while," Rikamon said sincerely. "Anyway, I think the next tamer we should give this gift to is Jeri; I think she'd like being a big, strong and fat Leomon."

         "I'm actually curious to see what a female Leomon would look like," Renamon added. "Would she look just like a male one, or would she be more like a real lioness and lack a mane?"

         "In that case," Takatomon said, "I can call her and ask her to come here." He then grabbed his phone off the bed and called Jeri, something found relatively difficult with his new clawed hands. "Hi Jeri. I was wondering if you could come meet me and the others at Guilmon's old hideout in the park. We've got a surprise for you... Ok, I'll see you soon." He then hung up. "She'd be here within half an hour."

         "Ok then," Rikamon said. She and Renamon began setting the food out on the table. "Yeah, we've brought lots of food; we're gonna need it given how much Digimon can eat."

         A little while later...
1322313321212.title: Takatomon is born.

132231332124.content:
Henry wasn't sure what he felt, He was trying to decide when a soft glow out of the corner of his eye caught his attention.

         "Uh, Renamon? Why are you glowing?" Terriermon looked at the large vixen with wide eyes as she stopped her rub to take notice.The Glow was soft, not like the bright light of a digivolution. And more of a golden color, like... well, like the unique shine that Gold could give off.

         "I'm... not sure," Renamon rolled her neck and gave a soft murrr, "But it feels... good." She stood up and gently twisted about on the spot as she felt up her sides. "Oooh, like having a massage in a warm bath..."

         "Renamon," Rika marveled looking at her, "You're... bigger. You're getting bigger."

         "What?" Renamon blinked in surprise and looked down over herself. But amazingly it was true. It was very small, hard to spot unless one knew what to look for. But as Renamon's keen eyes watched the curve of her stomach as she stood still, she could see it increasing a millimeter at a time with every heartbeat. And that wasn't all. After her transformation, Rikamon had grown to almost the same height as Renamon (maybe an inch shorter), but now Renamon felt herself looking down ever so slightly to meet her partners eyes as the tip of Rikamon's vixen nose was about level with Renamon's neck.

         "It... ooooh, feels so good Rikamon," Renamon moaned, rubbing her body happily as she felt it tingle all over from the expansion, "So nice..." Unfortunately for Renamon the changes stopped far sooner than she was ready for them too. In the end she'd grown maybe another couple inches and perhaps a proportional fifty pounds of fat.

         "Um, what just happened?" Terrirmon muttered with a cocked head.

         "I don't know," Henrymon mused putting his new pawed hand to his chin and getting distracted for a moment as he felt a 'double chin' under it, "It happened after Renamon changed me though."

         "So maybe if I change someone else it'll happen again?" Renamon asked, sounding a little too eager to try it out.

         "Ooh, we should go try it on Takato next," Rikamon smiled, "I bet he'd love this. And we can get some bread at the bakery." Renamon's stomach grumbled in agreement.

         "Now hold on," Henrymon began, "I'm didn't say-"

         "Or we could go see Jerri," Renamon cut Henry off, "I am curious to see what a female Leomon might look like."

         "This is serious, we need-"

         "Mom and Grandma might be home soon. I wonder if we can make them Renamon too?"

         "You can't just-"

         "Suzi, Lopmon and Henry's Mom Mayumi, should be back from the store soon," Terriermon added, earning a glare from the former human who couldn't seem to get a word in edgewise.

         "Ooh, that's a good point Terriermon," Renamon nodded, "Maybe..."

         "ENOUGH!" Henry shouted, "This is getting out of hand. How do we know these changes aren't messing with our minds? We need to go down to Hypnos now. They're the only ones with the technology to figure out what's happening to us."

         There was a moment of silence. "How about wee put it to a vote?" Renamon asked.
132231332124.title: A Growing Vixen

choices: Rika forgives her, and urges them to go see Takato and Guilmon
Rika forces Renamon off and runs off
Rika just needs some time to adjust, she'll feel better soon.
1322313322.content:
"Renamon...?" Rika asked as she looked down at herself. "What...happened?"

"Well" she spoke while waddling over, "If I had to guess, you became a Digimon. A Renamon like me." The chubby vixen looked at her, "Almost exactly how I used to be. Before Rika could speak again, her body felt warm. It appeared the data was still being altered. The clothes that were on Rika's body ripped off and reformed around her wrists, much like Renamon's gloves. Her fur became a slightly darker shade, looking more like it was her natural hair color, and her hair spiked back a bit to show her new ears peeking out. The emblem that was on her shirt now appeared on her legs in place of the previous markings. A belt appeared that wrapped around one of her shoulders and down on her opposite hip. The energy stopped, meaning the changes have ceased. The fat Digimon chuckled, "Actually, you look more than a Renamon, you're more of a...Rikamon."

As her partner laughed, Rika's new hands clenched into fists. She ran closer and threw a punch. The punch landed hard, but it was merely bounced off of all the fat. Still, the impact caused Renamon to take a few steps back from the force. She looked astonished to her partner, "Rika?! Why did you do that?!"

"I hate this!" She spoke, "Why did you turn me into a Digimon!" Rika threw another punch, but this time Renamon had enough speed (oddly enough) to dodge it. "My life was fine as a human! Now look at me! I didn't want this! What will my friends say? What will my mom think?!" The newly made Digimon gently grasped her head as she fell to her knees. "I...I never wanted this..." Deep down Renamon knew it was the wrong decision, but she made it so that Rika could see how it was. But now, she only caused more pain to her partner. The chubby vixen waddled and sat beside her partner. A hand was extended and Rika was soon embraced in a warm but fat hug. "I'm...I'm sorry Rika" Renamon apologized.
1322313322.title: Rikamon

choices: She awakes when the sun rose
Something more changes in Rika over the night (physical or mental)
13223133222.content:
"I was just looking out for my partner."

"Partner?" Renamon was pushed off as Rikamon stood, "Partner?! You think that's going to change it?! Calling me your partner?!" Rikamon huffed as she turned, "Renamon was my partner...she was cool, quiet, and resourceful. She was a respected Digimon. You, you're not Renamon. And you're no longer my partner." Renamon was hurt by these words, even if her face didn't show it entirely. Before another word could be said, Rikamon ran out the door in a burst of speed; too fast and too sudden for Renamon to catch with. The chubby digimon looked down to her fat hands, the hands apparently belonging to a now Champion Level Digimon. But, she no longer felt like a Champion Level; she felt more like a In-Training. She slowly sat down in her slump of depression.

As for Rika...

Rika ran to the park and hid amongst the trees. She cried silently with her knees to her chest and her head hung over them. Emotions and memories swirled in the now Digimon's mind. Renamon not only turned into some power-hungry fat pig, but she also turned her into a Digimon, hoping that Rika's mind would change. She couldn't believe it, this had to be a nightmare; but deep down she knew it wasn't. She sat in the trees, eventually crying herself to sleep.
13223133222.title: Runaway

choices: Rikamon, the new Ultimate Rookie Digimon
132231332221.content:
A cloaked figure slowly drifted across the sidewalks at night. The figure slowly drifted to the park, not stopping by anything. It made a beeline to a tree, the tree Rikamon was in. Gently, the robed figure began to float up higher. Rikamon's new sensitive ears picked up something, causing her eyes to open. She made a startled gasp as the robed figure was right in front of her. She could see two red glowing eyes deep within the hood. "Hello..."

It took a while for Rikamon to calm down, let alone have the courage to even speak. This was not a good time to even speak with her. But, the digimon muttered a few words, "W-Who are you?"

"Me?" the figured chuckled. "I'm what you can call, a friend. You seem to need one."

"I-I have friends..."

"Oh? You mean like the one that gave you those burgers, or the one that tried to turn you into a fat version of herself?" Both of the memories stung and caused her to breakdown again. However, a tissue was handed to her. "Now now" the figure spoke, "Don't cry..." Rikamon took the tissue ad wiped her eyes. She did feel a little better now, oddly enough. "Now, I've come to help you."

"H-Help?" Rikamon asked, "Y-You can turn me human again?!"

"Sadly, I am afraid not." This caused the digimon to lower her head. "But, I think I can help you with something else. A bit of...proper payback." Rikamon turned as the figure went on. "You see, unlike your "friends" I know the real reason behind this. Those nasty fast food burgers have this nasty chemical that affects the code for Digimon. The chemical causes a digimon to grow stronger, unfortunately causes a..."big" side effect." Rikamon nodded as she understood. "Now, payback is what comes to mind to the digimon known as Renamon. She thinks she can get more powerful no matter if she's fat or not. And she may be a champion now, I have a better idea. However, you must ask me what you want first. You want to let your "partner" get away with this, or do you want to face her?"

info.description:
I've seen too many Digimon weight gain stories where it's only the Digi Destined that change and almost never the Digimon themselves. So this is a story for everyone who wants to see Digimon grow.

Ok, I want a clean story. No mature themes. No blood and guts. And no Gay/Lesbian stuff (I don't have anything against such people, I just don't want such things in my stories).

If you need reference pics for Digimon, most if not all can be found here: http://digimon.wikia.com/wiki/Digimon_Wiki

EDIT: You can involve the kids as well, but I want the focus to be kept on the Digimon.
EDIT 2: I reserve the right to edit chapters as they are posted. I will fix spelling errors, grammatical errors, and try to make the chapter flow a bit more smoothly. But I will do my best to keep the chapter to what the poster wanted to happen. If you have a problem with that, tell me and I'll see what I can do.
EDIT 3: I won't tolerate /human/ vore. creature vore is fine. though.
EDIT 3.5: I'm expanding this to include Digimon vore. Any creature that is not intelligent is free to eat, though. Fish, deer, ect.
EDIT 4: Villans can vore characters, but I'd rather refrain from the heroes doing vore, ok? This is not an iron clad rule. It can be broken now and then. But I don't want to see a dozen chapters on vore in one line of the story, if you catch my drift. Fattening or muscle growth with some macro or microism thrown in is fine, though.
EDIT 5: I reserve the right to delete chapters that are either crudely written or absurdly short and only there because someone wants to control the next decisions made without contributing anything to the story.
